The Free State on line is never available and sometimes the program will let one of my friends benefit (I never know when it will ask or let it be free) but this year no one got the benefit, I paid the 19.99 for my personal State tax return.

title: I love the program and have been using it for over ...
content: I love the program and have been using it for over 10 years. the only problem i have is several times during a return the system will just shut down my computer. i have had three different computers during this time frame and it has happened each year. i must save after every step so when my computer goes blank and i have to restart i can return to the same step I've completed. it gets very frustrating but i keep using because it seems to very accurate and comprehensive.

title: I have always found the program easy to use
content: I have used TurboTax for several years. I have always found the program easy to use. The program walks me through the process step by step just in case I have forgotten a deduction. I like the way Turbo Tax transfers all my data to the state return without me having to re-enter the information. I had saved my 2013 information on a flash drive and TurboTax was able to pick up my background date which saved me time entering the information again. All I had to do was verify the date.

title: CUSTOMER SERVICE ???
content: Overall the program is tolerable. The problem I had was that one of my IRAs gave me a double distribution which I rolled over and I could not find any way to list it correctly on my return. I'm sure I will have to explain it to the IRS because there is a 1099R showing it as income. After waiting over 30 minutes for CSR help that didn't come, I dummied-up the return to reflect the correct numbers.

title: Good but expensive
content: I've trusted TurboTax for the past 7 years now but its getting more and more difficult to justify doing it myself compared to paying a local company. We live on a border town and my spouse works in another state. $40 more for the additional state plus 2, $19.99 e-file fees along with $50 for the software is just under the cost at a local firm. I really wish they would start offering options that would save money. Sure you can print it and mail the states in and save the $40 but very few users would want to wait.

title: Very Satisfied with Turbo Tax Deluxe Edition
content: Although I read that some people were having problems with the on-line version, I purchased my Deluxe edition at Office Depot and had no problems. It performed all the calculations as advertised and I electronically filed both federal and state returns with no problems. I got confirmations from federal and state that they were accepted and there were no problems. I have been using Turbo Tax Deluxe for 6 years and will continue to do so.

title: I definitely like the this product
content: I definitely like the this product, however the issue I have is that the product comes with one state, but if you want to efile the state return you have to fork out another 20 bucks to do so. Additionally if you need to use more than one state for your return, you have to fork out another 50 bucks for that, and another 20 to efile. I can see the 20 on the free state download. But really, your just stealing money from people when they need another state. The cost is more than the tax software.

title: I have been a user of TurboTax since 2008 and ...
content: I have been a user of TurboTax since 2008 and have never had the problems that I have had this year. Not only was I not able to upgrade via the internet but I was never able to call the 800 number an get any assistance. There were a lot of problems with last years version and I am a bit concerned that they didn't feel the need to have their telephone lines beefed up to handle the issues. I will seriously be considering other options for 2015.

title: Easy to use, watch for attached 'fees' ...
content: As simple to use as always. However, I find it deceiving that they say 'FREE' federal e-file and 1 'FREE' State e-file. This is FALSE ! There are fees with everything you do with this program. If you e-file, you WILL pay a fee of some type to someone using this program. And I did NOT get a return, I still paid in more to both state & federal... Again, it is easy to use. They even offer protection for your return (at $44.95 !)... Just keep that in mind...

title: Surprised to find added cost.
content: I did get Turbo Tax Deluxe as I have done for many years. I was so surprised and upset to find when it came time to do the state, I had to pay $39.00 to just do the state part. So that was very disappointing that I had to pay extra. I do trust Turbo Tax and it is easy for me. It was my fault for not examining the container carefully before downloading it; but felt it was a little deceptive of Turbo Tax to make changes without making it clear to the customer.

title: and have always been quite happy with it
content: I've been using TurboTax Deluxe for many, many years, and have always been quite happy with it. This year's "feature switch" was a disaster. And, even after two attempts to make it right,Intuit seems to have done a sloppy job of it. My free upgrade to the premium version (because I needed the removed schedules) somehow got revoked on a subsequent routine updates. I hope they learn something from their ill-advised marketing decisions and technical failures...

title: I'm glad we were able to download the additional piece to ...
content: This was easier to navigate than last year. I'm glad we were able to download the additional piece to be able to do a more involved return and REALLY glad we didn't buy the next level Turbo Tax. We would not have been pleased to find that we spent and additional $30 for something that we could add for free. Shame on Turbo Tax for making this seem like a real gift from them when in fact they were pretty much "forced" to provide the additional forms.

title: ... the TurboTax program for many years and have always enjoyed the process
content: I have used the TurboTax program for many years and have always enjoyed the process. This year I was really impressed with all of the new features. The program is very easy to use and with the help screens I was able to get a nice refund this year. The site also guided me to set up my files for next year. I am already collecting documents so that I will be ready for next years tax season. I would recommend this program to everyone. GOOD JOB!!!!

title: Needs work in my opinion.
content: Filed state and federal taxes electronically. I had to find a "work-around" for a donated car deduction. I think the college expense calculations are wrong.

title: and the 2014 version worked as easily and thoroughly as ever
content: I have used Turbo Tax for over 8 years, and the 2014 version worked as easily and thoroughly as ever. I never used the forms that were moved to the next higher up version, which initially upset so many former users. However, the back of the package clearly states what was changed, so I can only guess that maybe some of those who were upset, just assumed nothing changed, and didn't read the information on the back side.

title: Thanks, I did not get $25 rebate. Here ...
content: Thanks, I did not get $25 rebate. Here is part of an email that I received. "If you're a returning TurboTax Deluxe CD or download customer and you've already filed using TurboTax Premier or TurboTax Home & Business, we're offering you $25 cash back. Simply visit TurboTax.com/25back to claim your money. "

title: welcome to the club we all have been there even if we do not admit it
content: you said it was not as good as you would have liked I AGREE you said next year would be better plase make it easy as you have in the past I LOOK FORWARD to the new (old easy) for next year. I worked in IT for just over 40 years and even when I tried to make everything I did EXCELENT!! It did not turn out that way and I had to make it RIGHT That is what you did this year! I will be back next year and the next year etc!!! This year turned out good any way!!!!

title: I really enjoy using TurboTax
content: I really enjoy using TurboTax, it lets me know what I can and cannot do to complete my taxes. It has also informed me to some items that I was not aware of that could be added to my taxes. My only complaint about this years Turbotax is, I live in Nevada where there is no State tax. Why do I need to buy a program that has state included in it? For the last 10 years I have always purchased the Federal Only program. This year it could not be found. Why?

title: Used basic all of these years fine. Now you have to pay the extra buckes ...
content: Used basic all of these years fine. Now you have to pay the extra buckes for Dellux that you used to be able to do with Basic. Planning on using HR Block next year.

title: Very easy to use
content: Very easy to use. Have been using Turbo Tax for many years now, at least 10 years if not more. I am always constantly amazed at how many options they use. The only option that I would like is for TT to write to a CD, so if one changes computers you can bring the prior year up via the CD. My computer crashed and I had no back up, well the back up wouldn't work on the new computer. Otherwise, I love Turbo Tax. Valerie Herman

title: Last year with Turbo Tax
content: My last year with Turbo tax. I've used it exclusively for over a decade. But they are bilking customers by not including Schedule C in the Deluxe version. That's crap. H&R block's is cheaper and includes Schedule C without having to upgrade. They got greedy and I hope they lose customers!!

title: Three Stars
content: OK not as good as last years

title: Great Program
content: Have used Turbo Tax Deluxe for years and never disappointed. With the hacking scare I did my taxes early and am now complete. A relatively easy program that fits my needs perfectly and will very likely return to Turbo Tax next year. I especially like the feature of being able to log on and get updates as to when I can expect my refund. I just hope that in the future any security flaws have been taken care of so I can rest easy about getting hacked.

title: Good software but could be better
content: I would like it better but when I tried to do my state taxes, it somehow gets the idea that I had a business, which I don't I live on retirement. No matter what I did, I couldn't get it to drop that. Which is just as well, since they charge $19.99 to efile a PA state return???In my opinion, that is just plain stupid. I don't use all the five Federal E-files why can't I have just 1 free state efile? Good software but could be better.

title: Problems were solved
content: I have used Turbo Tax for the past six years. I became very familiar with the program and I like ease of filling in the required information (prompted by the questions). This year everything went smoothly until I went to e-file my returns. I was unable to do so and it was by luck I found Intuit's customer service number. I was on the phone for one and a half hours. The rep was patient and very helpful. I was then able to file my my returns.

title: Slow and Clunky for Mac-very frustrating
content: The downloadable version is slow and clunky for Mac. There was a glitch in downloading last years info also. TurboTax was only giving the 10% extra for Amazon if you download (as opposed to using the online version-only 5%). now i see why, that is the only way they could get people to download this poorly put together Mac software.

title: ... used TurboTax for about 20 years and has been great at carrying over data from year to year
content: I've used TurboTax for about 20 years and has been great at carrying over data from year to year. This year when I saved my unfinished work I lost everything I had inputed (happened twice). Also I had problems inputing Income from a Trust. TurboTax wanted me to upgrade the software to the next level. I finally found a way around having to purchase the upgradee ($30) for a very small amount o income. I may try another software program next year.

title: ... used Turbo Tax since 1986 I find it very easy to use and understand expect when the president of ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax since 1986 I find it very easy to use and understand expect when the president of turbo tax sent me an email saying there was a error in the program and as soon as we filed our taxes we would get $25.00 back after I filed I tryed to get my money back and it said I dont quailfly can you help me thanks send to Nancy L Rich 107 Evatt Drive Goose Creek SC 29445 843-568-6960

title: TurboTax...My Hero!
content: TurbiTax has taken my trust in self-help programs to a new, higher level. Before TurboTax, I was spending hundreds of dollars to have my taxes prepared by professionals. TurboTax has given me the confidence to do the taxes myself. I get them done sooner and get my refund back sooner, as well. I am also learning about the ins and outs of Federal and New York State income tax laws. Who says you can't teach an old dog new tricks?

title: ... TurboTax since 2007 and always found it to be perfect for my tax situation
content: I have used TurboTax since 2007 and always found it to be perfect for my tax situation. I received e-mail alerts from TurboTax about possible problems with the 2014 version, but my 2014 tax return was not affected. I am appreciative of TurboTax identifying the problem and offering assistance. It, I think, is proof of their willingness to stand behind their product. I will use TurboTax again.

title: I love Turbo tax but liked the older versions better.
content: I have used Turbo tax for four years and have been very pleased with it. It makes it easy to be up to date on the latest tax changes and does it automatically. I liked previous years better than the newest format which I found cumbersome and not as simple to use if a person had some previous tax experience, which I have. Nevertheless, the software is very good and I would use it again.

title: Turbo Tax worked great for our federal return
content: Turbo Tax worked great for our federal return. It saved a lot of time. However for our MS state tax it did not work well. I ended up doing the MS tax by hand. It was having trouble transferring the 1099 forms from the federal. I went back to check and everything input seemed fine. Also I did not want to itemize on the state return and did not see an option to take the standard deduction.

title: We've been using TurboTax for several years now and love it! The step-by-step instructions walk you through the ...
content: We've been using TurboTax for several years now and love it! The step-by-step instructions walk you through the tax maze, making it seem easy. It is very simple to go back to re-check the information submitted. Our State form is completed, mostly by information supplied to the Federal form, in just minutes. The information input throughout the year to Its Deductible and imported to TurboTax is a great time saver! Thanks for a wonderful product.

title: Turbo Tax
content: I was going to hire a tax accountant to do my taxes this year because now I'm retired. Well, that would have cost a lot of money so I thought I would try Turbo Tax and it was a breeze! Walked me through everything and I am definitely not good with numbers. I would recommend this for anyone. I have my refund back already!

title: It was OK
content: Turbo Tax was easy to use. It doesn't seem quite as good as previous years due to the barage of ads and constant marketing blitz shoved at you while trying to get your taxes done. Since I have used this product for years, it was good to have my information imported but I am thinking about alternatives now.

title: Good for what I need..
content: Hey... I don't have a lot of twists and turns in my taxes. I could do it by hand myself, I just like the way Turbo Tax walks me through it so I don't forget something. That, and I have all the worksheets worked out for my records. The $50 bucks I spent on it is less expense than taking my papers to someone to do

title: City Tax issues!!!
content: Turbo Tax becomes less user friendly each year.! There needs to be a lot of work done on the City Return, i.e CF 1040. I had to spend hours trying to identify problems with my City return both of the past 2 years. If I didn't know tax processing as I do, I would have never been able to find the problem. Accessing tax forms should be easier, reviewing individual forms is the only way to isolate problems.

title: Great refund!!!
content: We got a great refund! Thanks! It was so easy to do and all I did was follow the instructions. I was concerned so I HRBlock double check ( they do it free ) I did perfect! It is nice to know that I still have the ability to do it myself!! Thanks again!! I would recommend this to anyone that has basic taxes.

title: I called the technical service department and although he was very nice and sympathetic
content: I have been using TurboTax since 2004 and this year is the first year I had problems with the program. I had to force my returns to efile. The error kept saying I was not connected to the internet. I called the technical service department and although he was very nice and sympathetic, he couldn't help with my problem. I will still buy this product next year ~ I just hope the problem is fixed.

title: I have been using TurboTax for a number of years ...
content: I have been using TurboTax for a number of years now. I find it walks me through every possible deduction and constantly updates itself even after I have filed my taxes. Filing is included and is so convenient to have everything right there in the program in logical order that it takes a lot of pressure off the filer in trying to do the actual deed. If you want to do it yourself, this is the program to use IMO.

title: I think that it was easy to use and I have the last 5-6 years ...
content: I think that it was easy to use and I have the last 5-6 years on my computer which is good for me. I am still confused about the state tax filing. I did my state tax (I thought I got 1 free state tax filing with my software-)-when I went to file--it was going to charge me $19.99? Did i miss read or misunderstand? I called the help number and waited 45 minutes; has a case number; never got a response. If you can supply that would be great

title: Great program
content: I've been using Turbo Tax for years,this year some areas were a little different and sometimes hard to understand but got through them. Turbo Tax beats the other programs by far, the only thing I don't like about Turbo Tax is I can't find the phone number to talk to a live person and that to buy another state costs just as much as I paid for the whole Turbo Tax Deluxe. This is the only program I would use, very user friendly.

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014
content: There was the problem at first that I couldn't prepare a Schedule C with this version of Turbo Tax, but they fixed that. Taxes were easy to get through as usual but when I was all done the program didn't figure out that I didn't have any income to go with one of the Schedule C's and it was still there with all zero's. I had to manually delete the form.

title: Happy User
content: The software works perfectly and the questions direct an amateur accurately. The successful filing without intimidation is gratifying. The part that does not meet my expectations is that the SC state filing requires $19.95 additional charges even when no taxes are owed. It seems rather ancient to have to print out the state form, apply postage and mail it to the state agency which then has to have someone manually key in the information.

title: Average satisfaction for Turbotax
content: The package works fine but had glitches. I think Intuit is taking us (the customers) for granted. I had to purchase my state package for OR twice. I do not like to pay for e-files for state. and I do returns for multiple people in my family. I will be looking at other options in future years

title: The version I received initially had some features missing that ...
content: The version I received initially had some features missing that were standard in previous years. Public complaint made Intuit update the program to restore the missing parts. The alternate had been to buy ($) the Premier version. I used the updated program but was surprised to find that in the final summary I had to pay a penalty: the program did not warn or explain the reason.

title: the only improvement that I would subject is when errors ...
content: the only improvement that I would subject is when errors are found after the system check, they should have a link to where it is in the process to make the change or be able to change it within the check

title: TurboTax is Great
content: Have been using TurboTax now for 10 or more years. Have always loved the product. Is easy to follow and asks the pertinent questions to obtain an accurate return. And once you have used it pulling in the info from prior years makes it even better. Would highly recommend the product to anyone looking for tax preparation software.

title: I like Turbo tax but in 2008 they failed to catch ...
content: I like Turbo tax but in 2008 they failed to catch a mistake I made and by the time I found out it was to late to do anything about it. I have used them before and after. Just make sure you check and double check before you send it off. Their program is easy to understand and easy to use. I will continue using them altho I was and am unhappy they did not catch my mistake.

title: Very good. More than I need at times. Can I print just the 3-5 forms I want rather than 15-18 pages?
content: This does a good job with my tax returns. My only concern is that I forget some of the commands in the time of 12months. Have to try to figure out what some of the commands mean. And the final filing has a lot of precautions before the final key. At times I want to print the page I M working on. Don't find a way to do this. Is there a way to list the total deductions only rather than having to list them individually?

title: Problem loading on desktop
content: Rather disappointed. I have been using TurboTax for probabloy 15 years without problems. This year I could not load it on my desktop, which is a P4 with 3 gb of ram. I tried all the suggested solutions. The system had all the current MS updates It did ran OK on my laptop which has a Celeron, but it was extremely slow. I ran the 2013 version on the desktop without problems. I will think twice about buying TT for my future taxes.

title: Turbo Tax is easy to use for the most part
content: Turbo Tax is easy to use for the most part. I used the deluxe version because it offers a free state download and checks for errors in both. Unfortunately the state accepted my return and promptly put it in the audit file. Now the expected date for my return has be moved out to June 14, 2015. Turbo tax stated the we where a low risk for an audit, but so much for that. Might use something else next year, not real happy right now.

title: Some instructions / descriptions were confusing; not enough explanation ...
content: Some instructions / descriptions were confusing; not enough explanation about exactly what certain IRS terms really mean. And not all State and Federal forms were on disc; had to download / update. And while it didn't take as long as last year (where I never WAS able to download them all. Had to call Customer Service, who helped me. And it took over 3 hours!!), it still was a pain.

title: I have trusted you in the past and I liked the way I was able to file my tax ...
content: I am not sure if Turbo Tax was responsible for the IRS regection of my filed tax return because of identity theft using my Social Security number to file a tax return. It was cleared up in my favor but I read a newspaper article that stated Tunbo Tax had some type of security breach. I have trusted you in the past and I liked the way I was able to file my tax return but now I have doubts about security.

title: Don't get fooled into paying for your "1-free" efile State return
content: When filing my 1 free efile State return, TT insisted that I pay for it. I called the TT helpline and although they couldn't get me through it without having to pay with my CC to process my return, they did process an immediate credit which took 6 days to process.

title: Previous versions of this program are better than this new one
content: I understand every year something changes with the taxes. Previous versions of this program are better than this new one. Separating the forms is rather taxing and more expensive. The best program that was used was 2011/2012 when all necessary forms were in one version. In the future please take into account that when doing taxes and having to continue to go back and forth and or stop to add and purchase more forms, is inconvenient.

title: lacking
content: Not great. I had to upgrade to find out about taxable capital gains on sold house. In the end turns out no tax owed. Still had to pay for the upgrade.

title: It usually does what it is supposed to do.
content: They keep raising the price on this every year. Soon it will be cheaper to hire a person to do it. It does help get the forms filled out correctly, but on the State forms it doesn't fill out the direct deposit information for my state. It caused me issues where I lost part of the money from my refund due to the state not reading the tax forms but using the QR code on the front of the form.

title: 2015 Turbo Tax
content: Bought this because of tax season and because I am a 20+ year customer. I agree with all the other complaints about Turbo Tax and the changes they made in an attempt to make a larger profit. It served its purpose for 2015. If they continue to make changes to the forms available and continue to charge for those, I will definitely be changing over to HR Block or some other tax preperation software.

title: Long help time
content: Have used TurboTax many years without a problem. However, this year a had a problem getting it to e-file. Called the help lines and over a three day period spent 6 hours talking with three different people. Now that amount of time normally would really have irritated me to no end. However, the courtesy and understanding of the help staff finally got everything worked out and I remain a faithful customer. Gary

title: I have always enjoyed the ease of use and the fact that advice ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax to prepare our taxes for close to 10 years. I have always enjoyed the ease of use and the fact that advice and explanations are available if needed. I like it so much that I chose to use Turbo Tax even though I was working as a tax preparer for another company and had access to and authorization to use their proprietary software to prepare my taxes at no cost to me. I trust Turbo Tax and will continue to use it.

title: Quick and Simple
content: Turbo Tax is so quick and simple to use. I have done my taxes for years using Turbo Tax and feel confident that I have taken all deductions that are due me. It is nice to be able to do my taxes in my home and complete both the federal and state in one afternoon. I had my federal refund in 4 days and my state a few days later. Thanks for a great product.

title: sched C not included in Deluxe like previous years and they want you to pay more ...
content: Surprise.......sched C not included in Deluxe like previous years and they want you to pay more to get other version. Also requested help via IN and no response, so I had to figure it out by myself.

title: Less pain, more gain...
content: Turbo tax takes almost all the pain out of doing taxes. It practically takes you by the hand and leads you through the process. I have used it for the past four years and have no intention of changing to another company. It is truly worth the price!

title: I like the fact that the info from the previous year ...
content: I've been using TurboTax since I've owned a computer. I like the fact that the info from the previous year is merged on to the next year. You put the info in once. With the info in there, you know what paperwork will be required to do your taxes. Very nice feature. Very simple program to use.

title: Slowest version in more than 15 years of turbo tax
content: I have used ttax for many years and 2014 is the slowest version ever. From updates to loading returns I was able to get coffee (brew a new pot) to fixing lunch for the grandkids while waiting for this version to load. The actual computations were clear and accurate but I was exhausted when it was finished. Next year may require a change of product.

title: Good but not perfect
content: The product worked very well. I was able to input my info quickly and easily. It did cost more than in years past, but it was still quite reasonable. One small complaint I had was that at one point it asked me to restart my computer. I did that and it didn't bring me back into Turbo Tax. I had to go back into my folders and restart Turbo Tax after the computer came back up. Minor, but a little aggravating.

title: because of the excellent experiences in all the past years
content: I have used Turbo Tax for years, but this year, I had a problem. I could not send my state tax because of a error message, which did not exist. I could not contact Turbo Tax for help. I then filed my state tax through another program and had no problem. Besides that, I will again use Turbo Tax next year, because of the excellent experiences in all the past years.

title: Went from good to bad!
content: We've used Turbo Tax for over 10 years; this year has to be the worst ever. I've had several bugs pop up that it wants to report that I've never had in the past. Also, with the removal of some of the forms from the Deluxe version; it forced us to upgrade to the Premier version, which is when the bugs started. Next year; I will seriously consider a different vendor for my tax needs.

title: ... for quite q while and I have been very pleased, however I do have a concern with the ...
content: I have used TurboTax for quite q while and I have been very pleased, however I do have a concern with the 2014 medical insurance portion. I have retired and as part of my retirement package from work I purchased insurance for my wife who is not of retirement age. nowhere on your tax form is there an entry for that. It's a little disconcerting when the government will be making a larger issue of this next year.

title: Great Product
content: Great program, easy to navigate. You can do a step-by-step format or you can do a more self guided format, they both work well. I haven't found anything that works better at getting me the biggest refund. It continually updates while you are working with it, so you will never miss any IRS updates.

title: The interface this year took some getting used to. ...
content: The interface this year took some getting used to. Some of the forms from last year were missing in this version. The option to print were different also. I wanted a full set of worksheets; but could not get them to print this time. Plus there were several updates during and after I filed.

title: faster, easier, and more efficient than doing taxes on paper
content: The program leads you through the process and knows all the right questions to ask, so we feel confident it's being done right. It also can store information from year to year (which you would otherwise need to go look up,) making the filing process a breeze. Completed and filed in less than 2 hours. Excellent product, highly recommend.

title: ... about 5 or 6 years and I am very pleased with the product
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for about 5 or 6 years and I am very pleased with the product. It walks me through the IRS and State provisions that apply to me and makes during my tax filing very easy. I think there were a couple of changes to the 2013 Turbo Tax program, but it seemed to be even easier to work with. I would recommend this product to others. Keep it up!

title: Great ..,but upgrade didn't work. :(
content: It worked great and i was able to do my taxes easily. I was also able to import what i had done and saved in web version, which was essential for me. The only downside is that Turbo tax had mentioned free upgrade for people who purchase deluxe version this year. When i tried to upgrade it didn't allow and was asking me to purchase upgrade each time.

title: I was almost ready to quit it after the switch that seemed like a con
content: need more info on the state tax forms, I file in Alabama, not as much info about what and how to claim something. I was almost ready to quit it after the switch that seemed like a con, but they did the right thing so I'm glad I stayed with them. It is easy to use and the federal forms give good descriptions and definitions of what you can claim. Good Product.

title: One Star
content: Could not get it to load.

title: Great Product!
content: This product has always worked perfectly for me over the last 6-7 years I've used it. Finds all the deductions I can take and makes sure there are no errors. their work sheet for advising the value of good donated can't be beat. Has really been very beneficial to us. Great product!!

title: Reliable - as far as I am concerned.
content: I have used Turbo Tax for quite a while. My tax situation is not complex, and it does what it has to do very well. It offers the better choice and allows you to override it as well in all categories. The Audit check is good, bit again not entirely sure in more complex situations. But as I have said, it has always worked well for me.

title: Wasn't satisfied!
content: I almost went back to HR Block for their program. This one gave me more trouble than I ever dreamed of. I'll have to think hard on next years program. It wasn't as easy as the last two years.

title: Did not like that you had several different turbo tax versions- liked ...
content: Did not like that you had several different turbo tax versions- liked it better when you had turbo tax federal and state or turbo tax federal.

title: I was very skeptical about the 2014 Turbo Tax since ...
content: I was very skeptical about the 2014 Turbo Tax since the Deluxe edition had changed and there was so much negative comment. Being a long time Turbo Tax customer, I decided to give it a try and I was pleasantly surprised to receive a free upgrade. In fact, I thought the upgraded Turbo Tax was easier to use than the 2013 and prior editions. Thank you TT/

title: good product but expensive
content: Very easy to use and will walk you through any questions or issues you may have but still think it is to expensive as you can only use it for that year of taxes, would like to see where you can buy either on line or as a CD where all you have to do is upgrade the disk to the next year at half the price.

title: Turbo Tax performs admirably for my particular needs. It ...
content: Turbo Tax performs admirably for my particular needs. It could be improved by adding the capacity to attach supplementary files (.pdf or some other universally-readable format) so that electronic filing would still be possible when supplementary explanatory sheets must be filed.

title: That would be a great reward for loyalty
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for years, almost since it first came out and have found it simple efficient to use and it always finds the most deductions for me. The only thing I wish they would do for us long term users is give us the same sale price for automatic renewals that they give to Costco and other retailers. That would be a great reward for loyalty!

title: Note Free At All.
content: This is sold to have free Federal & State E File Note Like $39.Federal & $20. State Don't sound to me.

title: Increase Your Security NOW
content: I man not happy with TurboTax security. Your company needs to make it a lot tougher for fraudulent filing. If you do not take steps to improve security, I may stop using your products--all of them. The Maryland state tax forms could have been better. One rather puzzling entry only applies to state workers. That should be made clear immediately to the 99 percent of applicants who are not state workers.

title: I have used Turbo Tax for years and loved it and highly recommended it
content: I have used Turbo Tax for years and loved it and highly recommended it. This year I had trouble downloading to print. I helped my sister who wanted to do the free e-file for the federal and print and save and send in the state and never found a place to do that, or the address. I found it to be a breeze in years past and a struggle this year right at the end......

title: everything went smoothly. I elected to file the state ...
content: everything went smoothly. I elected to file the state form manually rather than pay $30 for turbotax to send it via efile. I had a really difficult time printing it out. the process was not user friendly. I needed to go to help twice to figure it out. turbotax should include all the steps to file manually within their basic package rather than leave us cheapies floundering. becky trieff

title: Used it for year and really like it!
content: I liked Turbo Tax, it kept asking me questions on tax deductions and I liked that. I have used Turbo Tax for 8 years and to me it's simple and easy. I like it because throughout the year I know what I can deduct and can't and have a special file set aside for just turbo tax questions.

title: Amen, Amen!
content: An excellent vehicle to learn how to collect relevant tax data, prepare spread sheets for the current year, and download them into a tax return. It is a system that speaks federal and state tax code, reviews your data and assembles the most accurate information to recover a refund, if any. As in my instance it helped me to minimize a tax debt. Now my biggest concern is to collect accurate data.

title: Four Stars
content: I have used Turbo Tax software for years and it is consistently very easy to navigate, and very reliable. I have only had a few issues over the years, but never anything that has kept me from re-using. A great product for people who are already relatively tax-savvy and are looking to save a few $$$!

title: Fourth State return higher price to E-file?
content: Our family all use Turbo Tax for family returns. What a surprise when the fourth return cost more to California E-file than the previous three. Not fair. Intuit has gotten too cocky with dropping some of the forms and making you move to higher level. They backed off but why even try to pull that fast one on all your customers.

title: The format used to fill out the forms is vey easy to follow
content: I don't think we should need to pay that high a charge to file and send a Virginia state tax form, because the Virginia form uses a lot of the federal info when completing the info needed on the state form. The format used to fill out the forms is vey easy to follow. I also like the way the info from the previous year is listed as a reference while you doing the info for the current year.

title: Good Value!
content: I was very impressed with the ease of installation and use. I am fortunate that my return is fairly vanilla. Using my accountant would have cost $160 to have my return completed and submitted as Efiles. The deluxe package still required an additional $19.95 to include state Efile and that was disappointing. I decided to just use snail mail to submit the state return. That cost one Forever stamp.

title: May change next year...
content: I use this software each year...this year there were constant updates to the software. If I had to pick only one thing that I don't like about the software is the $19.99 "fee" to process my state tax return...really? Is the processing to email the state return any different than the federal return which is processed for free???

title: Love it but Don't make stupid upgrades again
content: I have used TurgoTax from it's beginning and love it I was glad they corrected their mistake of changing the product from previous years. They upgraded me so I could use the same forms without paying an upgrade fee. If they had not done that I may have changed what I used as a principle.

title: There has never been a charge like this in prior years as the direct deposit came ...
content: As usual, TurboTax Deluxe suited my needs perfectly, as it has for the past few years. The one thing that bothers me is why I had to pay a third party middleman to 'process' my federal refund this year. There has never been a charge like this in prior years as the direct deposit came directly from the U. S. Treasury. Hopefully, someone has a rational answer/explanation for this change.

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed and State
content: I've used TurboTax for about 4 years now. It's great. Walks me through every small detail. It double checks everything and it compares it to the last years return. Then it gives me the option of mailing or electronically sending my return. I will buy it again next year.

title: This has to be one of the best tax preparation software on the market
content: This has to be one of the best tax preparation software on the market. Easy to use, very thorough on info gathering. I have used Turbo Tax for many years with no problems. I have total confidence in this software. I feel very comfortable when my taxes gets to IRS that there will be no problems.

title: Expensive and Hidden Fees!
content: Does the job, but its to expensive and has hidden ridiculous fees. Cost you MORE to have the fees taken out of your refund, versus giving them a credit card number. Around $40 more. WTHeck

title: I like everything about Turbo Tax 14 except that it needs ...
content: I like everything about Turbo Tax 14 except that it needs to tell you how to pay to efile your State Taxes. I thought it would send me to a screen to enter my credit card number. It did not, in fact I had to end up having to pay extra (35 dollars extra!) to pay for it from my federal refund. Paying to efile your state tax should not be hard but intuitive like the rest of your product. Fix it..

title: Turbo Tax is the best
content: I have used Turbo Tax for YEARS. I have never been disappointed. My Mother had her taxes prepared by an accountant for years, I did her taxes one year and she got a healthy refund. She was so sure that I had done them incorrectly, she took the taxes return to another accountant. Guess what the refunds were exactly the same. But she was charged $250.00 by the accountant.

title: Disappointed in the checkout payment process!
content: The rate of three was based on the fact that I could not use my debit/credit card to pay for filing my federal and state taxes. I was forced to use my income tax return and had to pay the extra money to upgrade the TurboTax! This all meant it was not free to file my federal taxes. I will have to truly decide whether I will use TurboTax next year.

title: Easy, thorough and awesome
content: Easy, thorough and awesome. Anyone can do their taxes using TurboTax. Don't EVER waste your money using H&R Block or any other vendor to do your taxes. All they are doing is asking you the exact same questions as TurboTax does and typing in your answers, yet charging you hundreds of dollars to do so. I've been using TurboTax since 2006 and will continue in the years ahead!! It's fantastic!

title: State forms were not available in January, and for ...
content: State forms were not available in January, and for what I paid for Turbo Tax - Deluxe, I feel e-filing state forms should be free as well. You can do your federal taxes online for free.

title: Hate to admit it
content: Hate to admit it, but I found the 2014 Federal to be confusing. Repeatedly went back to the 2013 edition to check if entries were in the correct place. After talking with a few other Turbo Tax users, I found I was not alone. Perhaps a different company next year.

title: Good program but worried about identity theft
content: I had a fairly simple tax return so I didn't run into the problems other people did with this program. I liked the overall layout of the program and the question format was easy to follow. The only hesitation I had is that I had read about possible identity theft problems with TurboTax this year. But I took a chance and so far things seem to be fine.

title: ... Turbo Tax for years and it has been a great experience. Not only does it work well with ...
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for years and it has been a great experience. Not only does it work well with my finance program (Quicken) but I can do my taxes at my leisure. One of the greatest things is that it has taught me so much about tax laws and allowable deductions.

title: easy to use
content: have used turbo tax for many years easy to use and have never had any problems till this year this year we were victims of identity theft when we went to the i.r.s. we found that half of the people there were also victims and like us had used turbo tax to do there taxes the good news is you will find out when you efile would be nice if turbo tax found a way to stop this

title: Have used TurboTax for years but this version was useless for state prep
content: Have used TurboTax for years but this version was useless for state prep. It did not recognize non-taxable retirement income for Louisiana residents. Wasted money. Will not use again.

title: Turbo Tax Deluxe no longer does Sched D.. ...
content: Turbo Tax Deluxe no longer does Sched D.. investment income. You have to upgrade to more expensive version. I'm switching to H&R Block after being with TTD for more than 15 years.

title: So called improvements for 2014 were not helpful
content: Iâve used Turbo Tax for decades, but I may not use it next year. Tax preparation was easy and straight forward until I skipped a section planning to go back when I gathered the needed information. This would have been simple in previous years, but not after the so called improvements.

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed +Federal File
content: I absolutely love TurboTax Deluxe. Everything I needed or had questions about were readily available. I like the ability to "go back" to previous screen to ensure I made a correct selection. I also like I can save to continue later. I have used this product the past 5 years and will continue to do so.

title: TurboTax is a fine program but they suffer from a lack of customer ...
content: TurboTax is a fine program but they suffer from a lack of customer care. They changed their program and did not inform their customers of that fact. They always offer customer rebates after I purchase the program and they do not make it retroactive. They do not acknowledge the fact that some customers are loyal. I will use the other tax software next year.

title: Great Federal / Incomplete State
content: A very good federal return experience resulted overall. The state return is still unfinished by virtue of the program would not print the Indiana State estimated tax program for mailing in with the noted amount and date. It down loaded but would not print the necessary data for filing.

title: im still here for now
content: its still a good program...but they were this close to losing me as a customer because of the changes they tried to institute. rule number one is dont piss off your customers...i guess they heard us loud and clear and hope they do not try to reivisit these changes next year. i can just imagine how many customers they lost ...

title: Be prepared to pay additional fees
content: TurboTax definitely made filing my taxes easier. My reason for 3 stars and not 4 or 5, is the hidden cost, Paid an extra $39.99 to file CA State income tax and another $19.99 to file electronically that is in addition to the $49.99, that I originally pad for the software. The price would have been about the same as taking to H&R Block and having someone else do them.

title: Easy to use with the lest effort achieving the BEST RESULTS
content: Exactly fits my needs as a homeowner with some investments and a lot of charity work. Saves a bundle come tax time when other tax services are compared. Easy to use and checks for anything I may have forgotten. I will continue to use Turbo Tax as I get the best results with the minimum efford.

title: One Star
content: New version omits multiple tables previously included in this version. Upgrade is required. Intuit is reimbursing cost of upgrade

title: Disappointed
content: I am extremely upset that you "claim" federal filing is free but turn around and charge me a $34.00 "fee" instead. You obviously think we are stupid. Just because you call it a "fee" we know you are "charging" for the service each time we file. I've filed 5 returns. You Stuck me for $170.00! H&R Block is in our future. If you can't be honest brokers, you've lost my business.

title: Easy and thorough
content: Always easy to go through and get our best deductions! I am a travel nurse with many deductions yearly. I used to pay $200 to get my taxes done until 2006 when I went and picked up a copy and got the same refund my tax professional did! I do it all on my own now.

title: Not as User Friendly as in Past years
content: Too Many changes this year and not as user friendly. We have been using since it came out and was just harder to work with, perhaps due to the new stupid a tax Changes, I don't know. The format seemed different.But we were able to get through it and file electronically and got refunds back in a week. That is an awesome thing.

title: 2 stars
content: Easy to use. Did not like the additional fee added for checking the return. I knew there was a fee for state filing. # rd year of using turbo tax but with new fee may discontinue.

title: TurboTax user for several years
content: Have used TurboTax for several years. This year you advertised that the filing for the state tax would be free, but when it came time to file we still had to pay for filing our state tax form. We still used TT and will continue but if you advertise something you should honor it.

title: I am not that satisfied that I had to go through so much trouble ...
content: I am not that satisfied that I had to go through so much trouble to enter Sale of Investments which Deluxe does not have. in the past Basic and Deluxe enabled me to enter this info without using Premier. I guess TT needed more profits because it would cost me $69.99 instead of the $39.99 I paid for Deluxe. I got by this fiasco this time but I wonder what will happen next year.

title: Income and Retirement Income
content: I have used for several years and love the product. I wish there was a warning when it comes to income. I am retired and it seems each year I put the retirement income in the earned income and it takes me awhile to straighten it out. Just a note explaining these entries in plain English would help

title: but I was disappointed to see that the forms for rental income have ...
content: Very similar to previous years, but I was disappointed to see that the forms for rental income have been removed and are only available on the next package up. I did not expect this, and it was too late to return it when I used it. That change should have been made more obvious at purchase time.

title: Very easy to use
content: Very easy to use . Just follow directions and you can't go wrong. Any questions do arise they will have the answer for you. The first program that I felt like I wasn't left in the dark. The company really want to help and provide a service. They did a bang up job.

title: I have been using TurboTax for years and am very disappointed.
content: I had to upgrade in order to complete my taxes. Also it did not upload my last years information automatically. I have been using TurboTax for years and am very disappointed.

title: Unlike years past, this year's version would not allow ...
content: Unlike years past, this year's version would not allow me to enter business deductions without upgrading. Please fix before next year or I will be switching software vendors.

title: Good overall but sometimes it insists there is an error ...
content: Good overall but sometimes it insists there is an error on a certain form and after reviewing ten times and seeing no errors I filed anyway. Could not figure out how to get any help without paying extra fees. I may try another software for next year and hope it is better.

title: Change is good
content: Until I received the notice from Costco, I was ready to return the unopened package because it did not include a schedule D. Once the issue was resolved I used the 2014 Turbo Tax Deluxe. The instructions were easy to follow but the best part was not having to enter the payers information on the forms.

title: I like Turbo Tax Deluxe because it is easy to use ...
content: I like Turbo Tax Deluxe because it is easy to use and understand. Using Turbo Tax Deluxe I have be able to do my own taxes. I have not received amy complaints from the IRS.

title: I was or happy that TurboTax did not contain all the forms when ...
content: I was or happy that TurboTax did not contain all the forms when I filed my State tax and printed it out it said "do not file". I had already sent in the file. I turned out that I did not need the forms that were missing (luckily). Every year TurboTax makes changes that are said to make it easier to file but changes are not always that simple or understandable.

title: Great software, Easy to use!
content: This is the fifth year of using Turbo Tax and I find it just as easy to use as the first year. All the previous year's info is imported to the current software making it convenient to use. I feel the step by step process is thorough which gives me confidence that my return is done correctly. I will continue to use Turbo Tax.

title: GREAT Tax prep program
content: BY far the easiest tax prep program and thoroughly asks you all questions that even you don't think of. Have been using this program for 3 years and only gets better and easier to use as the program takes all the info from the previous year and starts you off right

title: One Star
content: Unable to do state taxes after purchase, no refund from turbotax

title: ... using this version for a long time and I like it. The only problem with this version or ...
content: I have been using this version for a long time and I like it. The only problem with this version or any version is that you don't get to choose the form in which you want to use (i.e 1040 or 1040A), and its hard to understand what to do when you have a side business but no business ID number. Turbo needs to address this. The cost to file is confusing as well.

title: It Is great until you need to make corrections from a rejection by the State.
content: It's great software to use, but if your State Return gets rejected, it is difficult to go back in and make corrections. Especially if the software offers to take you back in and make corrections. At that point, TT leaves you standing at the bus stop with no bus in sight.

title: WE HAVE USED TURBOTAX FOR AS LONG AS WE CAN ...
content: WE HAVE USED TURBOTAX FOR AS LONG AS WE CAN REMEMBER! IT HAS BEEN A QUICK AND TRUSTWORTHY METHOD FOR FILING OUR FEDERAL AND STATE TAXES. WE WILL DEFINETLY USE IT IN THE FUTURE AND RECCOMMEND IT TO OUR FRIENDS.

title: I like it. But this time I was a little ...
content: I always have use turbotax. I like it. But this time I was a little bit disappointed with turbotax. They charge you extra for audit, when you said you are not interested and they still charge you $39.99 for it. That was a disappointed. For everything else in turbotax. They did what was suppose to do for the normal tax deductions. So, overall it okay.

title: Greedy fools?
content: Will never use TurboTax again! Program had same name but no forms needed seems they care more about profits than customers.

title: Worked for me as always--
content: I was worried since I read it was different but it addressed all my tax issues just like previous years. I don't know about next year as I will be forced to take out a portion of my IRA. I don't know if the Deluxe addresses that so will find out before I buy.

title: Disappointed
content: I am disappointed this year. I ran my data through another product and I could have gotten more refund. I am still waiting for Intuit to get the forms for Minnesota taxes.

title: I think TurboTax is getting to big for their britches ...
content: I think TurboTax is getting to big for their britches. They seem to think they are the only player in town by raising their cost 50%. May elect to try H&R Block next year.

title: So far so good
content: So far so good. Last year the state found an apparent error in the programing after filing....so I'm waiting this year. I pointed it out to the company but never got so much as an apology. Surprised it was so much additional to file state online. Otherwise the program seemed easy to follow for 2014.

title: This year truly awful
content: Could not update and re-efile very disappointed with this edition, very user unfriendly!

title: Read multiple times before filing or else pay more!
content: The software is great for getting through your taxes. The only heartburn I get is the tricky wording at the end before you file. You are asked a slew of audit protection questions and you say no and yes. Then before you know it you are paying an aditional $40 something over and above. Tricky wording for filing needs to be segmented differently to avoid confusion.

title: Love it!
content: I work in an office that helps people with disabilities. We do a lot of tax preparation mostly because our clients get small EIN credits. However occasionally we get a little bit more challenging return we need to help our clients with, TURBO TAX IS GREAT!!! Our agency loves it and I love it for its ease of use and help tutorials.

title: Have used Turbo Tax Fed for years satisfactorily. Tried ...
content: Have used Turbo Tax Fed for years satisfactorily. Tried Fed + State E-file for2014. Fed = ok, State not so. Used Alabama state tax forms from web site. Fed refund rapid.

title: More Difficult than Past Years
content: The actual software works very well, but getting it installed on my computer was more difficult this year than ever before. It seems that every time I had a new tax item I had to address, I had to "upgrade" to another version. The new downloads were never activated until I called the Customer Service number and a tech advisor assigned an authorization code to my upgrade - very time consuming and complicated. Then, each time I started up the program, I was prompted to automatically update the software, which never worked right. I have used TruboTax for over 10 years, and for some reason, this year has been a nightmare to download and update. I know Intuit is aware of this and hopefully they will correct it for next year or I am gone.

title: My Personal tax advisor
content: Used Turbo tax deluxe as I have for the past several years. Did not need to upgrade to Premier. I can't believe I can do our taxes so easily with your program. I am a very senior citizen and plan to continue using TT. It has improved and made easier each year. I do hope you don't repeat the faux pas forcing people to upgrade to Premier.

title: I used to love Turbotax, despite little issues that were always thee ...
content: I used to love Turbotax, despite little issues that were always thee in the program. But with 2014 I had bigger problems with the State forms that really irritated me. Turbotax help was anything but. I ended up filing my state taxes on the state's website because Turbotax failed to fix the state forms problem in a timely manner.

title: Despite the e-mails promising that they would add back the ...
content: Despite the e-mails promising that they would add back the features that they removed at no cost, I still had to pay an extra $30 to get back the feature for royalties.

title: Let confusin rein
content: All the notices and announcements about changes to TurboTax left me in a state of confusion. I have no idea if I am entitled to a refund or credit, if anything at all. The news stories about id theft and false claims for state refunds was disconcerting and I seriously considered abandoning Turbo Tax. I hope not to have this again next year.

title: r
content: I have used turbo tax for about 20 years I worked for Intuit here in Albuquerque NM since they came here. I used TT ever since. I wish that the its deductible was included in the software package instead of on line. It is somewhat inconvient on line I also use Quicken as well and have since working for Intuit. hank you Samuel M Musso

title: False advertises about free e-file for state returns
content: Think it is over priced for what you get. False advertises about free e-file for state returns. If you try to file state free, forget it, you will be charged $19.95.

title: Could not believe you have to pay an additional 19 ...
content: Could not believe you have to pay an additional 19.99 to file your state taxes!!!!! I won't be purchasing this anymore as I can file my state for free on a web site!!!

title: #1 in my book...
content: I've been using Turbo Tax since 2004. To me it is worth the time of going through each step. I've never been disappointed with the final results. And filing electronically is definitely faster. By filing early, both return refunds were back within two weeks.

title: I am not pleased with Turbo Tax as I was not informed of ...
content: I am not pleased with Turbo Tax as I was not informed of the changes to Deluxe until I had purchased and was working returns. Then I was told I had to upgrade to Premier at a cost of $30. I think it should be changed back for next year as I do not need Premier. I probably will look for another provider next year. It also seems very slow in navigating around.

title: Messy Entries
content: I've used this product for about 20 years, and frankly found the 2014 program quite 'messy'. I can still do taxes with pen and paper, so I'm familiar with many of the qualifying questions on various entries. There were several areas where the questions were completely out of order based on the tax subject. Got the job done, just messier than any prior year

title: TT is easy to use and clearly defines the various options and ...
content: TT is easy to use and clearly defines the various options and issues. I've used it for a lot of years and have always been satisfied with the results. I usually take the expert representation option in case of audit - just for the comfort factor.

title: Mostly as advertised. There is an implied ability to ...
content: Mostly as advertised. There is an implied ability to eFile to a state, but actually the state has to be snail mailed as no eFile is really offered. Read carefully. Some of the language is even more complex than the IRS instruction books.

title: Would like the opt[ion to itemize on Federal instead of using ...
content: i have used Turbo Tax since 2010. This year our deductables were a little short of the standard deductible and the system gave us the standard deduction. This caused our state tax to be considerably higher since if you don't itemize on federal you cannot itemize on state. Would like the opt[ion to itemize on Federal instead of using the standard.

title: Don't buy it..!
content: Don't buy it..!

title: The program appears to do an adequate job of preparing ...
content: The program appears to do an adequate job of preparing a return, but the series of questions asked does not give you any insight into what you might do differently the next year to minimize your taxes. I was also left wondering if the program really identified all of the options and deductions available to me.

title: Turbo Tax tried to scam us and omitted Schedule "D" ...
content: Turbo Tax tried to scam us and omitted Schedule "D" ... in order to get it had to buy upgrade... but then they relented and you could download the schedule "D" Because they had such a flurry of e mails against them! Watch out next year they will try again........ anything for the bottom line right???????????

title: Always good!!
content: We have used Turbo Tax for many years and have had good results. The one time we used a private tax preparer, I could have done it better and quicker so back to Turbo Tax programs. We like the comparisons the program does and also the audit potential that is shown. We will continue to use Turbo Tax next year and the outgoing years.

title: No charge for State tax form error!
content: I have been a user of TurboTax for years and every year it gets easier and easier. This year I incorrectly put money on a line item that was wrong and my state rejected my application. TurboTax took me through the right process based on the mistake and I was able to resend my state tax form free of charge!

title: Getting too pricey!
content: $40 dollars to file a state income tax return is way out of line. I paid less than that for Turbo Tax. I can have my taxes done for me for what I spent on Turbo Tax

title: I thought that Turbo Tax Deluxe was improved over last ...
content: I thought that Turbo Tax Deluxe was improved over last years edition. It was easier to navigate. Unfortunately, in Intuit's way of increasing revenue, the Turbo Tax reputation was damaged by not disclosing that a number of versions were excluded from the 2014 edition. Hopefully, the second letter of apology will minimize the damage that will occur.

title: Good product going down the tubes
content: Turbotax has gone to junk. Good product going down the tubes! Next year, I will try one of their competitors instead.

title: not happy. No life changes but I had to upgrade ...
content: Had to upgrade to finish... not happy. No life changes but I had to upgrade to premier this year to finish my taxes.

title: ... Tax for over three years now and have been happy with the product
content: I have been using the deluxe addition of Turbo Tax for over three years now and have been happy with the product! I started using the product when I noticed H&R Blocks fees were increasing. I was doing most of the work then and they were just entering the numbers into their tax program and taking a percentage of my return.

title: Turbo tax basic
content: I think it was terrible that I had to buy this one when I always used Basic for a lot less money and got the same thing. I am sure I will look at others next year.

title: IMPROVEMENTS FOR TURBO TAX
content: TURBO TAX SHOULD CHARGE ONE FEE WHICH WOULD INCLUDE FILEING FEDERAL AND STATE TAXES. IF I USE TRUBO TAX AND FILE STATE INCOME TAXES I FEEL RIPPED OFF BY YOUR EXTRA FEE. THEN IF I PAY BY CREDIT CARD, YOU WANT MORE MONEY. ITS THE OLD "BAIT AND SWITCH". WHICH RUINS THE ENTIRE EXPERIANCE OF USING TURBO TAX. REW

title: No Sch. D?
content: I'm disappointed that the version of Turbo Tax I normally use came without Sch. D. I will be careful to check next year to make sure all of the schedules I need are included. I have used TurboTax for a number of years and have been satisfied. I don't want to switch, but there are others now with the same features.

title: Turbo for Taxes
content: I have fairly simple tax returns, homeownership, income, interest and dividends - TurboTax let me breeze thru my return in record time, and I feel confident that it was correct. Now, if the IRS audits me in a few years, I may have to eat these words, but Turbo T did make an onerus job quik and EZ.ax
As ever, I enjoyed working with TURBOTAX EXCEPT for the print size or instructions on how to adjust them. That made this 82 year not so how happy with TURBOTAX.

title: turbo tax
content: I like using Turbo tax and it was very easy. The only thing I was disappointed was you were suppose to get 1 free federal and i did not get that and had to pay.

title: IT WAS EASY TO USE
content: IT WAS EASY TO USE . I WAS UPSET THAT THE FULL COST FOR THE STATE CLAIM WAS NOT INCLUDED ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX. WAS NOT HAPPY TO FIND OUT IT WAS GOING TO COST $60 MORE FOR THE STATE ON TOP OF WHAT WE SPENT FOR THE TURBOTAX ITSELF. WE MIGHT HAVE GONE TO A TAX PREPARER FOR CLOSE TO THE SAME PRICE FOR THE TOTAL PRICE FOR THE TURBOTAX.

title: I had a few problems with the social security income ...
content: I had a few problems with the social security income calculation form, total social security was counted as income. I restarted from the beginning and then everything went thru perfectly in accordance with my documents and accepted by feds and state. Within about four days I had my returns in my bank. Thanks Turbo.

title: I was pleased to find it easy to understand and fill out
content: Since this was the first time I had used Turbo Tax Deluxe for Fed and State, I was pleased to find it easy to understand and fill out. It was also great to be able to efile my federal returns, already have my refund! I will use this system again next year.

title: Capable, but too expensive.
content: I've been a happy TT user for almost 10 years, but this year (2015) the price increases over the last few years have finally convinced me to try something else.

title: EASY TO USE
content: TurboTax is the software I have used the last five years. Although I'm an attorney, it doesn't require any tax knowledge to be used. It walks you through the process with simple questions. I use "deluxe ", but my daughter used the free program. Hardest part of that was avoiding the continuous "up selling " of the product.

title: Professional presentation with turbo tax.
content: So far so good, the feds accepted my tax submission with no problem. Don't know if it is because of turbo tax or they are just lazy and blow through their jobs like they blow through their dope. I like to think it is becuse of the professional way it is presented with turbo tax. John Thompson

title: Turbo Tax worked great once I go it loaded on my laptop
content: Turbo Tax worked great once I go it loaded on my laptop. I've been using Turbo Tax for quite a few years and this year it would not load to my laptop. I took it back to Staples,where I bought it, thinking I got a bad disc but they were able to load it with an external hard drive. After I got it on the laptop it worked great.

title: I found that "AnswerXchange" is horrible. The only way to see the questions is ...
content: Outrageous that Schedule D is not in Deluxe this year. Also, in trying to figure out if I have to buy Premier, I found that "AnswerXchange" is horrible. The only way to see the questions is to ask a question first. There is no way to simply see the list of what people are asking. Horrible web design.

title: Works well and is straight forward.
content: I have used TurboTax for 15 years. Works well and is straight forward. Disappointed this year that I had to buy deluxe to get the forms I have used for years in the Basic edition. They offer some sort of rebate, but I gave up after countless hours of waiting on the phone as the on-line offer did not work.

title: Directions were not clear for me.
content: Generally, I'm very pleased with using Turbo Tax with one exception. I am a retired federal civil service annuant. It was difficult how to file since I didn't pay into Social Security and I paid taxes on my annunity amount when I was working and I turned 70 last year, but a percentage of what I paid is deducted from my taxable amount.

title: Turbo Tax - kinda OK, but lower your prices......
content: Been using Turbo Tax for years. Been pretty good. Noticed this year that they had some problems with what they offered and did not offer under the deluxe edition. Sounds like the upper management people got greedy and wanted bigger profits. It is a good product but when I see these kinds of issues makes me want to try a different tax product.

title: Turbo Tax worked fine for me except when I needed to communicate with ...
content: Turbo Tax worked fine for me except when I needed to communicate with Turbo about one or two data items in the tax form. There was no way for me to communicate about an item in the return.. Lacking communication, the system should be able to reconstruct how it arrived at a particular entry that I might question,.

title: It was easy, asked me all the right questions and did ...
content: It was easy, asked me all the right questions and did what I needed. The big flaw. When I finished Federal, it said are your ready to file your free State return. You have one free state return. Are you ready to use it. I said yes, but when finished, it wanted to bill me for state return, so I did not file state return via Turbo tax.

title: I like TurboTax Deluxe very much
content: I like TurboTax Deluxe very much, makes filing federal and state easy, Asks all the right questions and keeps me up to date on the latest laws. The only issue I have is that after I am done and ready to file , I get charged again for filing state income tax, I have been rebated in the past and am waiting for the rebate for this year.

title: Disappointed this year
content: Bought this after the company decided to upgrade business forms for free. This is the first time I've had problems with the software--printing forms and downloading the state took time because blank windows kept popping up. I've used Turbo Tax for years, but I'm not so sure I'll be sticking with them next time around. It might be time to check out other products.

title: Great tax service
content: We have used TurboTax for several years, and it is easy enough to use. The only inconvience is the time factor, but with patience it goes well. In the future we may use the e-z version, since the IRS has made the Schedule-A a moot point for retirees. We will continue to use TurboTax as long as it is available.

title: submit and receive my refund with the greatest of ease
content: As has been my pleasant experience for many year's now, TurboTax has made it not only possible for me to personally fill out, submit and receive my refund with the greatest of ease, this years Delux 2014 was no different. PLEASE.....don't try to fix something that is already working at it's peak.:)

title: 1099-C and Deductions Support
content: I continue to use TurboTax for Federal and State tax returns, a returning several years now product user. This year, the TurboTax resources provided helpful insights on 1099-C matters. Likewise, sorting out the itemized versus standard deduction issue at the quantitative dollar level, was integral to the product used.

title: I swore the state was always included but then the ...
content: I swore the state was always included but then the made me pay for it and download it after. The price is getting too expensive. Other than that, it was ok

title: Easy to use
content: First time we have ever used TurboTax and found it very easy to use and as far as we know, it was very thorough and helped us do everything properly. It saved us hundreds of dollars compared to previous years. Will definitely use again next year.

title: Worked for me.
content: Worked fine for me. Once I downloaded the additional tables that they eventually made available at no extra cost, it was just like previous years that I have used. I had some capital gains and sold a house and it was all covered with the free upgrade.

title: This product worked very well again this year. The ...
content: This product worked very well again this year. The only problem I am experiencing is getting the Federal Government and the State of Virginia to send me my refund. My tax information was received by both groups on March 3, 2015. They used to pay what was due within a week. This is not the case this year and I blame Obama!!!

title: concerns
content: with all the hoopla surrounding this years edition of Turbo Tax I must admit to not feeling 100% confident in the results of the product. next year I may either purchase something different or perhaps pay a professional to do my taxes. just lost the comfortable, confident feeling I've had in the past.....

title: Piece of cake
content: Pretty easy to use....this is our 3rd year using TurboTax. We just load it up and it finds the previous years' returns and copies all the pertinent data. After that its pretty much just fill in the blanks and wait for the refund to appear in the bank....less than two weeks this year.

title: Happy Now, But Probably Unhappy in Future
content: Happy with the results of usage, but unhappy they took away the parts for stock, as I might have to use that in the future, and don't think I should have to pay another $30 or $40 for that, when it used to be included in the standard software.

title: Thank Goodness for Turbo Tax !!
content: Easy to use with great results. It reminded me of deductions I would have overlooked even though I had done my taxes on my own for many years. I only wish I had used it years ago. Fortunately I have used it the past several years. Federal refund was super quick. Thanks for a great product !

title: It's definitely better than the old fashioned way of filling out the ...
content: I've never used anything else so I have no comparison. The first time I used it, it was a little bit confusing but over the years I've adapted. It's definitely better than the old fashioned way of filling out the forms and mailing them in. E-file is the way to go!!

title: I find it easy to use
content: I've used Turbo Tax for a number of years. I find it easy to use, with the program leading me thru the whole process and reminding me of items that may need to be reviewed. The automatic forwarding of info from year to year simplifies the processing, with pertinent data brought forward into the new year's return.

title: Have been using it for 15+years and it just keeps getting better. The system asks questions that give you options ...
content: Filing taxes cannot get any easier than by using TurboTax!!! Have been using it for 15+years and it just keeps getting better. The system asks questions that give you options and tallies up your refund or payment due while you are working through your taxes.

title: Easy to file in every field
content: Years-old founded tax sofware maker with professional guiding experiences. Easy to file in every field, including the e-filing. Quick help tracking the filing status from federal and states. I have trusted Turbo for almost two decades and am ready to recommend it to relatives and friends.

title: Total satisfaction with Turbo Tax.
content: I am always extremely pleased with TurboTax.I like that I can take the time that I need and not feel rushed and it is reassuring to know that assistance is there should I need it. The best thing is that the filing and refund is quick. I reccommend Turbo Tax to anyone wanting to simplify tax filing. Thank you Turbo tax.

title: ... use Turbo Tax every year and I think it's great. Very accurate
content: I use Turbo Tax every year and I think it's great. Very accurate, helpful and easy.I just wish it would give you at least one State E-file for free. I have never gotten better results from H&R or Liberty as I have with Turbo Tax and I can do it at my convenience and check and double check when needed.Turbo Tax is the Best.

title: very disappointed that I couldn't use my State on line (EXPIRED ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax for many years, very disappointed that I couldn't use my State on line (EXPIRED Feb 16th) I never get all my paper work until the end of Feb. The cost is also getting to be pretty high, why should I buy the program when we can get it off the internet? This will probably be my last year of buying Turbo Tax
