title: I think this makes doing your own taxes simple for ...
content: I think this makes doing your own taxes simple for everyone. I will never pay someone else to do them again. You can e-file up to 5 federal returns, which means my whole family can use it for less than I used to pay someone to do just mine.

title: I know NOTHING about tax laws or would feel comfortable doing taxes by hand using the instruction booklet that ...
content: I know NOTHING about tax laws or would feel comfortable doing taxes by hand using the instruction booklet that comes with the forms!! I've been using Turbo Tax for over ten years now. After going to a very well-known tax company and being told I owe over $2000 (never owed in my life and in NO WAY could afford to pay that) and they were charging me $500 to do the taxes, I left my taxes there and picked up a Turbo Tax. I ended up owing a little over $100 and paid only $60 for the Turbo Tax. I feel a tax company doesn't know me and what's going on in my life. Unless they ask all the right questions and I am already a tax expert and know what's important or not tax-wise, they may not get me all of my refund. Doing the taxes myself with the guided Turbo Tax, I feel 100% confident that I am getting all the refund I can. The program asks you questions regarding every situation and depending on whether you answer yes or no, takes you to the next pertinent section. I am middle-class income and Turbo Tax is the only way I will do my taxes. My husband was VERY skeptical! He thought I would not know enough to be able to do the taxes on Turbo Tax. He was worried about taking money out of his 401K and how we would know what to enter regarding that. After seeing how they guide you through EVERYTHING, he is now sold! I recommend Turbo Tax to ALL! It is easy and thorough!! Do not be afraid to use it!!!

title: A proven winner
content: I have been using TurboTax for over 10 years and find it easy and convenient. I know there have been some changes recently, but they have not had any impact on my use of this program. The instructions are clear, and there are numerous help links as well if you run into trouble. The ability to download the W2 data into the program is a big time saver and I believe also avoids potential input errors.

title: State file
content: The turbo tax I bought said 1 free state file . I filed my state tax and no had to pay for it. This is the second year in a row that this happened to me.

title: Easy and convient to use.
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for 5+ years. After getting all the necessary documents together, all I had to do was enter them by following the Turbo Tax instructions which were very clear and easy to follow. Then, all I had to do was e-file. Turbo Tax save me many hours.

title: I have used Turbo Tax since I went to college ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax since I went to college and found out about it in College in the early 90 - 91. I have no complaints. It does my taxes and so simple and I get a big refund every year. I get what I am suppose too but Turbo Tax makes it so simple. Jeanette

title: Make sure that you are not charged foradditional products
content: I like Turbotax by itself and use it for the last couple years . But I don't like that they are selling additional products like Audit Defense between filling and submission . When you do your tax you need to be carful and make sure that they do rip you off for another $50 for Audit Defense which is BS for me.

title: TURBOTAX 2014 REVIEW
content: I HAVE USED TURBOTAX FOR SEVERAL YEARS AND HAVE BEEN TOTALLY SATISFIED WITH IT. IT IS VERY EASY TO FOLLOW AND COVER EVERY OPTION AVAILABLE IN AN EASY TO USE AND UNDERSTAND FORMAT...GOOD INVESTMENT I WOULD SURELY RECOMMEND IT...DCTAYLOR

title: Great product, easy to use.
content: This product is so easy to use and walks you through all of the steps. Not sure if this can replace a CPA but for those of us with a straight return with deductions, TT is the best. I have been using this now for 10 years.

title: Outraged when they purposely omitted Schedule E forcing most people ...
content: Outraged when they purposely omitted Schedule E forcing most people to upgrade. Because of the backlash, they reinstalled it. Also charging $20 to eFile the state return is a total rip off, IMO. I mail my state return for that reason. Otherwise the program works fairly smoothly,

title: After all the controversy I was disgusted with Turbo Tax
content: After all the controversy I was disgusted with Turbo Tax. It's just okay. What I dislike is that after you input something, the screen goes back to the top instead of where you were working. I've lost faith in Turbo Tax, and will check out other programs for next year.

title: A good tool for the job!
content: I've been using Turbo Tax for about 15 years now. I have loved your product since the first time I used it. The format is easy to follow seems to make my job quite simple. Admittedly, my needs are pretty simple but from what I've observed you handle complex questions in a straight forward manner.

title: Very Good
content: It was very easy to use and the results were very good. My only issue is the charges for filing online seem high when coupled with the purchase price?

title: Still the best tax program.
content: I still think TurboTax is the easiest ta x program I've used. I do think the confusion caused by trying to break up the program so that each program got more specific was not well thought out before putting it on the market. Then offering deals to try and appease upset people caused more confusion .

title: charge to efile state
content: fairly easy to use.... however, I paid in advance to efile my state return but found I had to paper file as it was the first time efiling in my name (my husband died in 2013). Needless to say, I'm still trying to get my $20 back.

title: ... used TurboTax since day one and have always been pleased with it
content: I've used TurboTax since day one and have always been pleased with it. It always included one free state filing but no more. If I find another product that can import old TurboTax data I'm going to switch, may switch anyway!

title: Turbo Tax Works
content: I understand that Tax has had a problem this year, but I was not affected. A relative of mine was. From my point of view, doing my taxes is greatly simplified. From my relative's view, he was impressed by Turbo Tax's efforts to retrieve his records and clear his accounts. This is still in process.

title: It is easy to use and prompts through every step
content: This is the 3rd year I've used this product. It is easy to use and prompts through every step. Saved me a lot of money that I would've spent on a tax prep agency. Learned a lot about deductions and generally about how to file taxes.

title: I DEFINITELY DID NOT LIKE THE FACT THAT YOU COULD NOT TRANSFER MY INFO ...
content: I DEFINITELY DID NOT LIKE THE FACT THAT YOU COULD NOT TRANSFER MY INFO FROM MY 2013 FORM !!!! YOU HAD US SAVE IN THE PDF FORMAT BUT COULD NOT TRANSFER IN THAT FORMAT --EXCEPT THAT YOU COULD DO THAT FOR THOSE WHO USED YOUR COMPETITORS PROGRAMS IN 2013!!! I HOPE YOU ARE NOT GOING TO DO THAT TO US AGAIN FOR 2015!!!!

title: Turbo Tax go BOOM!
content: Of the three tax software available in my area I like turbo tax best, it's the easiest to use, it's format is the best. Over the past couple years it has improved greatly. It's features are great like importing from the other tax software I use.is amazing, I just like turbo tax best. It really impressed me this year.

title: TurboTax cannot be beat
content: TurboTax always retains information from year to year and helps me catch anything I may have identified in one year that I forgot to address in a later year. I have used TurboTax every year it has been in existence and wouldn't use anything else. The enhancements they continue to make have helped a lot.

title: Turbo-Tax secret Change
content: I have been using Turbo-tax for years. It is a very good program. However, this year I was very upset when they removed certain schedules from the program. I had not heard that they had done this. I was glad they decided to add it back. What was in the Deluxe version all these years should NOT be removed!

title: Super easy to use
content: I did my taxes in about 6 total hours and it was as easy as could be. Turbo Tax was my choice in years past, But had my taxes done for a couple of years. Came back to it for 2014 tax year, and I believe I'll stay with it from now one.

title: Evaluation of Turbo Tax Deluxe
content: I've been using Turbo Tax for a number of years and have always found it flexible and easy to use. I especially like the ability to go back and change information already entered into the file to recalculate tax liability. Also to pick up information from prior years for use in the current tax year.

title: I found it a bit confusing when I attempted to ...
content: I found it a bit confusing when I attempted to e-file my state taxes. I did call for assistance and was helped and then i was able to finish my taxed. I have used Turbo for at least 5 years and never had a problem before this year. Of coarse, I'll use it again..but retuirn to the easier way last year. Joan

title: I trust Turbo Tax and highly recommend it as it easily walks me through the steps ...
content: After having used another tax program that did not have the C/S, I switched to Turbo Tax some years ago and eliminated any future problems with the other program. I trust Turbo Tax and highly recommend it as it easily walks me through the steps to complete my necessary filing of taxes.

title: Four Stars for TurboTax Deluxe 2014
content: The CD version of TurboTax Deluxe 2014 was very easy to use, but did not require me to log in with a user name and password from the very beginning. I was able to enter that information later and save it, but this raises questions about how safe this tax software is to use with one's sensitive information.

title: It's a great do it yourself service.
content: So far so good, very simple process for the last two years with TurboTax. So much more cost beffective verses previous returns with accountant tax services. I would recommend this produst highly although this deluxe version is good for the more simple tax returns, I cannot comment on the more advance versions.

title: Any dummy can use it
content: I've been using Turbo Tax for at least 19 years. It has always worked perfectly. Anyone can use it. Just answer the simple step-by-step questions.

title: How to loss customers.
content: Having been a TurboTax user for years I find this years version to be the worst I've ever used. Numerous problems. Hope they get it right next year.

title: TurboTax 2015
content: Have used TurboTax for the last 12 years and very pleased with the product. I would recommend TurboTax over other products, as it very easy to use, imports previous year information and guides you through the process.

title: You Do Not Get What You Pay For
content: Overpriced for the features. I paid more this year and received less features. On a good note, my tax situation changed so I did not need the schedules I previously used. Other tax software is available and my friends and co-workers have given then good reviews so I will use them next year instead of Turbo Tax.

title: Eh, it is still Turbo Tax. It is good.
content: It is Tax Software... since I have been using Turbo Tax for a few years now, it gets even easier each year. Not only does it save your vital info, it even bought up the correct forms for Mileage Deductions for my wife's work... took me a little while to get correct form first time I used it, but now it looks at previous year and reminds me.

title: Let your fingers do the talkng, and the program do the work for you !!!
content: TuboTax worked smooth and quickly as before. Prepaired, filed, and received conformation and exceptence the same day from both state and federal. Just annswer the questions and let the program do all the work for you. Jim S

title: Used for 10 years +
content: Great product I have used for 10 years now and for doing personal taxes this is the way to go. It takes me a couple hours every year and I am done.

title: TurboTax makes you your own tax professional.
content: Simple directions to follow. Easy to complete. Fast. Highly recommended. Why pay a professional when they are probably using this software or something just like it? Do it yourself. You have to collect the information anyway. That is the real work in preparing taxes. TurboTax makes filling out the forms easy.

title: Super easy to use
content: I've been using TurboTax for a number of years now. I like how I get the immediate calculation of how I'm doing so far. It is so simple to import all of my data from past . I was doing my taxes this year and had a question that I got resolved in minutes on the forum.

title: I have been using TurboTax for ten years but this ...
content: I have been using TurboTax for ten years but this year I was worried my tax situation would be too complicated for TurboTax to handle - silly me: TurboTax road in to the rescue!! I will always use it!

title: Great software, used for first time in my life ...
content: Great software, used for first time in my life for my 2014 Federal Tax return. Was easy to install, setup and compile the tax data. The printouts were awesome. The eFILE system was the best. Received my refund from IRS in a week. Will use it again for the 2015 Tax period.

title: Gouge and gouge some more!
content: I think is robbery to have to pay for state e-filing--I will mail it--I've used turbo tax for years--but it seems if I am not paying $90 for the online version--you are gonna find a way to punish me --- so feeling let down--there are other providers. Perhaps after almost 2 decades it's time for a change of provider!

title: TurboTax just OK for 2014
content: The Federal tax return was acceptable, but I was disappointed with the Illinois State version, as the finished version was not ready to print until mid-February. Intuit should not have released the 2014 version unless it was ready to go, as-is.

title: Turbo Tax
content: I've been using TurboTax since 2002 and love the ease in which I can complete my taxes. You can do an auto rebate direct to your account, or set up a payment from your account, whichever the case. This product saves time and money in going to a tax office. Al

title: No stress.
content: TurboTax takes the stress out of doing taxes. It takes minimal preparation and walks you through everything step by step. They have done a really great job putting this software package together. I have used TurboTax for the last six years and it gets better every year.

title: Great Returns with Turbo Tax
content: It is easy to use and takes you through all the areas that you request or direct. The returns are great. I did not think I would get the amount back that I did for this year. I have used it a Tax Consultant in the two previous years and had to pay. They said it all right there. Thank you Turbo Tax.

title: Taxes Made Easy
content: We use Turbo Tax every year and it has always been a great and easy product for us. It really breaks it down and makes a complicated task simple.

title: Disappointed in Turbotax this year. Been using them for many, many years.
content: I had to manually fill out schedule 'C' this year to complete tax form. It always worked OK before. Wasn't worth $40.00 to have them fill it out.

title: Without Internet it is Useless
content: I do not like the fact that you must be connected to the internet to use the software. Living in an area where internet is not available means I had to leave home to work on my taxes. You can not make changes to the sections you have completed without being online.

title: TurboTax takes care of helping with all deductions and makes it easy to enter
content: I don't have to think about what I may have forgotten...there is no need to worry. TurboTax takes care of helping with all deductions and makes it easy to enter, with questions of things I never considered.

title: it's that easy. (that said
content: assemble forms. install software. follow instructions. file taxes. it's that easy. (that said, I had some trouble getting the auto-install feature to run - perhaps I should have removed the old versions of TurboTax first? at any rate, after about three tries, it decided to work.)

title: unless they actually enjoy going to see their tax prep person annually and ...
content: Use TurboTax every year - don't know why most people think they need someone else to do their taxes for them with this tool available. Guess they just need to try it once and see what it can save them......unless they actually enjoy going to see their tax prep person annually and sharing the experience.....

title: I have used TurboTax for over thirty years and have ...
content: I have used TurboTax for over thirty years and have never had a problem with the exception of a double chargearound four years ago.. I have also used two different tax program and found them to much more difficult that turbotax

title: Not Impressed
content: First not impressed with way it took several attempts to retrieve previous years information. Do not like that I have to pay to have State filed, this may cause me to go to a different source next tax year, most are cheaper and do same tax filing and do not charged 19 dollars to file State.

title: Federal fine State Tax poor
content: Federal tax was fine but the state portion failed due to poor security and the forms not being ready.

title: It's turbo tax. Its a convenient way to file ...
content: It's turbo tax. Its a convenient way to file the necessary paperwork to fuel the blood sucking government and politician's personalized agenda.

title: 1st year RMD's are not easy...
content: TurboTax was great for 2014 taxes but for just one exception. The part about the 1st year RMD is very hard to follow. Obviously it's not made for those people at all. Next year will be easier for reasons to lengthy for here. My suggestion is to make 1st year Req. Min. Distribution MUCH easier.

title: Long Term User
content: I only got the new version and it was fine. I've heard that sometimes TurboTax misses stuff. If so, I'm not bright enough to see it. So far, I've mostly done well, but then I have all these college loans for my Master's.

title: I like TT
content: I've been using TurboTax for many years. It's user friendly and guides you through all the deductions step by step if needed. You can also skip the areas you are not interested in saving time and still getting your maximum deductions.

title: Problem With Turbo Tax Not Importing Deductions from Its
content: I have never had a problem with Turbo Tax in the past 4 or 5 years I've used it. However, this year, my deductions would not import from my (Intuit Turbo Tax) Its Deductible account, so I had to (re) enter all of the entries again onto the tax form.

title: Easy to use
content: I have used TuboTax for several years. It is very easy to use. I have never had any problems until this year. I was unable to print with the system you had-pdf. I always print a copy for my own. This was the only complaint.

title: Simple Turbo Tax Filing
content: I used Turbo Tax for filing my taxes last year for the first time. Very simple to use and great directions. Liked filing my own taxes online.

title: Gone down in quality
content: Very Disappointing

title: TurboTax Delux 2014 Review
content: My wife and I have used TurboTax over the past 5 years for business and home use. To date TT has been a reliable and simple software program for all our tax filing needs. I recommend it highly and will use it for future tax filings.

title: Not much different from previous years.
content: The software is basically the same. It is user friendly and asks the right questions to get your best refund. I still believe that the charge to e-file the state, $19.99 is outrageous considering you pay $50 for the original software.

title: User friendly interfaces and thorough coverage of tax situations
content: As always, TurboTax saved me a lot of headaches doing my taxes. The software is thorough in questioning the user about the different areas of tax preparation, and it is very user friendly. I have been a TurboTax user since 2010 and plan to be a customer for as long as I have to fill out taxes.

title: Solid product with a disappointment
content: Always a solid product, have been using TT since 2007. Disappointed that, when I realized I needed a version with state, TT wants $39.99 to add it, when I could have simply paid an add'l $10 when I bought it at the store (already purchased and installed). That's just not ok.

title: Only problem is that if you live in a non-income ...
content: Only problem is that if you live in a non-income tax state, you are still ask if you want to file a state return and to pay their fee. In prior years, when you purchased the deluxe package, you received one state free. Not this year. We will have to wait and see about next year.

title: I love the product
content: I have an accounting minor, having said that, I have rarely completed my own tax returns until I retired and began using TurboTax. I love the product, they keep me abreast of new rules (which are constantly changing) and lead me though the process quickly and effortlessly. Thank you. JET

title: questions concerning upgrade
content: I was told because of investments (stocks purchased and sold) that I would have to upgrade to premier. I had already downloaded all of the investments and it looks like it filled out the schedule D correctly. What would premier do that the regular one didn't except cost me another $30?

title: Have used Turbo Tax for years didn't think I should ...
content: Have used Turbo Tax for years didn't think I should have to pay for state filing as it should be part of the original price not after the fact oh by the way. The way it states "TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed + State + Fed Efile... " should include the state efile as well

title: Very easy to use
content: Very easy to use, step by step instructions. I was a bit scared at first but then I started and it was super easy, and fast. I got my return back in 7 days. And I got a few emails updating me on how the return was going. Very pleased with Turbo Tax.

title: A good value if you are a Prime member
content: A good value if you are a Prime member. With the news about Turbo Tax I was afraid I had purchased the wrong product given that I have capital gains to report, but that issue was apparently resolved because the app handled my return without any problems.

title: No longer cheap
content: By the time you file your taxes with this software, cost of the software, state filing, and other fees it will be cheaper to go to HR Block,

title: Very disappointed that TurboTax Deluxe requires and upgrade to complete taxes ...
content: Very disappointed that TurboTax Deluxe requires and upgrade to complete taxes for investment income. Last year this version is all I needed.

title: Best tax software!
content: Have been a TurboTax user for years and find it easy and thourgh. Assistance at any point in your preparation by simply clicking on the highlighted item. Issues found in this years aoftware were quickly fixed and released. This will be my tax prep software for years to come.

title: I have always been happy with Turbo Tax
content: I have always been happy with Turbo Tax. It is very easy to use and very reliable. The ONLY complaint that I have this year is that I was misguided for the $25 that I thought was promised to me when I purchased my Turbo Tax from Costco. I filed and requested this $25 and was denied.

title: Just like last year
content: Just like last year, I e-filed my Turbo Tax income information on 03 Feb. (2014 and now 2015). Both were "received by IRS" on 5 Feb (2014 and 2015). Coincidentently, my refund from the IRS was deposited into my account on 19 Feb (both 2014 and 2015). Quick, easy to understand, no problems.

title: Reliable, accurate, easy...
content: I have used Turbotax ever since I move from CA to IN in 2004. In 2004 I did IN state tax, CA state tax and Federal tax. Never had any complaints from the government. Always got refunds as expected, if they were due. Support is very professional. Great product!

title: ... I really appreciate how it walks me through the painful process of both federal and state taxes
content: I've been using it for several years now and I really appreciate how it walks me through the painful process of both federal and state taxes. It's user friendly and explains questions as you go. It's much cheaper than any tax service and keeps me up on what I might need differently each year.

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed + State + Fed Efile... Intuit
content: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed + State + Fed Efile...Intuit worked excellent for me with no problems. I have used TurboTax Deluxe Fed + State + Fed Efile...by Intuit for the past 5 years with no problem. Dr. GF

title: good for the money
content: Worked good. Just took a long time to get bugs fixed and updated. I was done filing and had to wait for 3 weeks to get an update for a form.

title: Easy for a Senior.
content: Great for us. It is so easy to follow and feel like you have accomplished success. I only wish that you could start it and take a break and go back to where you ended if you want. I had to start over. I have used it for years and will continue to use it as long as I can.

title: Purchased Turbo Tax DeLuxe to do my taxes. When ...
content: Purchased Turbo Tax DeLuxe to do my taxes. When I got to where I purchased a new home and sold the old one it wanted an additional $30.00 to complete the return. I feel I got ripped off by Turbo Tax. Lester Williams les1240@aol.com

title: TURBO TAX IS GREAT, BUT I DO TAXES FOR MORE THAN FIVE ...
content: TURBO TAX IS GREAT, BUT I DO TAXES FOR MORE THAN FIVE FAMILY MEMBERS AT NO COST. THE PROGRAM SHOULD BE EXPANDED IN ORDER TO COMPLY WITH STATE REQUIREMENTS TO E-FILE TAXES THAT WERE COMPLETED WHEN USING A TAX PROGRAM. I CAN NOT E-FILE THE FEDERAL RETURNS FOR MORE THAN FIVE RETURNS

title: Excellent do it yourself software.
content: Excellent very easy to follow instructions. Didn't have any problems getting my refunds. I am very pleased and will be using this software again next year as long as the cost remains reasonable and continues to provide all the forms necessary to handle my personal needs without having to upgrade..

title: and totally love it. The 2014 return was a little more ...
content: . I have used Turbo Tax for 5 or so years, and totally love it. The 2014 return was a little more complex as our beloved government keeps changing everything which causes confusion to some degree. Of course, in my opinion was simply to re-distribute wealth and we are certainly not wealthy.

title: Best Price for an excellent tax package
content: Amazon had the best price for this excellent software, without having to submit the coupon for the rebate. I have used turbotax for years.

title: So simple.
content: Very simple to use. I recommend turbo tax to the average tax payer who dosn't want to spend $400 at H&R block. I used turbo tax for the past 10 years. The only difference was this year I purchased the deluxe turbo tax in which I thought there wasn't a big difference from the basic.

title: Super easy to use
content: Super easy to use. It was my first time using this product after having an accountant do my taxes for several years. I was done in just over an hour (joint refund with my husband including multiple state documents) and I got the same refund I did last year using the accountant. I'm sold!

title: Accurate & Easy To Use
content: The best feature is the automatic entry of W-2 info from our company website with just a couple of clicks. It's good to know that the return is error free in this era of complicated entries & allowable deductions.

title: annoying.
content: They sent me am email for $10 discount after I had already purchased it. It asked me for #9.99 for Tennessee when Tennessee has no state tax. several times it said we were done, only to reveal new items which needed review; some of those items were a zero instead of a space. annoying.

title: It's easy to use and follow and gets me a great ...
content: TurboTax worked perfectly as always. I've trusted Turbotax since 2008 and it's never let me down.It's easy to use and follow and gets me a great return and finds money i didn't expect. Well done and keep up the good work. See you next year!

title: Turbo Tax is my new "tax accountant"
content: I was terrified of doing my taxes. I had always had a tax professional do my taxes. After a move to a new state I didn't know anyone and a friend recommended Turbo Tax. I'm so glad she did. I had to file taxes in two states along with the federal. Turbo Tax took the stress and fear out of the process. I would recommend it to anyone.

title: Easy to use
content: Easy to use. Imports data from previous year to simplify process (do not have to re-enter personal data). Compares this years return with previous year and with average return in US. Accurate descriptions in "help" sections to better understand questions and answers.

title: Good product. Could be laid out better
content: Have used Turbo Tax for several years. Good product. Could be laid out better. For example, with every category within the income category you have to go down a list of your previous entries. Clumsy.

title: I have used this for years. It seemed a ...
content: I have used this for years. It seemed a bit easier this year. There was one minor glitch where it introduced something I had not entered and I had to work around it. I will likely stay with this product.

title: I found TurboTax to be very good. I do have one suggestion
content: Once again, I found TurboTax to be very good. I do have one suggestion: seems to me it is too easy to miss the place where quarterly tax payments are to be entered. I missed it and had to spend quite a few minutes working back to the point where I could enter that information.

title: Late filing? Relax use Turbo Tax.
content: I have used Turbo Tax for several years. I find it exceptionally configured to help the least tax knowledgeable person prepare returns. It is user friendly and loaded with helpful aids. I have used it for personal and business and years where the return was complicated.

title: Good product, BUT No help available to answer questions! No humans available...
content: Good product! Better than paying someone else to do it for you. As long as you have a return that is not complicated or complex, it is great!!! The only down side I have with it is it is impossible to get a human being on the phone to answer a question or something!!!

title: I love that it carries over the info from the previous ...
content: I love that it carries over the info from the previous year so I don't have to reenter. If you don't do it all in one sitting, it sometimes asks the same questions over again, but it really beats doing it all from scratch.

title: Good but not always simple
content: I did some sub-contracting work this season....the automated guide was confusing at best due to the limited category descriptions. I ended up going old school and working directly on the tax forms. Over all still a good product provided you don't own a business.

title: it works
content: It works, for me it is easier than getting all the docs together to take to a tax preparer. A few years back I was called for an audit and it was clear the IRS auditor fully accepted my TurboTax printouts as clear evidence that everything was in order. No finding against me in the audit.

title: removes the anual dread
content: I have been using TurboTax for many years. I have found it to be very convenient and easy to use. It is especially nice how it finds and downloads so much data from the previous year to save a lot of input.

title: The software is fine but I felt the lack of transparency was aggravating ...
content: The software is fine but I felt the lack of transparency was aggravating with regards to the state tax filing. Nowhere along the way did the prompts indicate the cost fo filing the state tax with this version. Next time, be more upfront on the cost and not wait until the taxes are completed.

title: Efile rejected. Could not get straightened out without purchasing ...
content: Efile rejected. Could not get straightened out without purchasing another program. Switched to H&R and have already received refund.

title: Changes this year were poor. I think TT's concentration should be at a ...
content: "Change without reason costs money, usually the consumer". Steven M. Robinson 04/03/15. Changes this year were poor. I think TT's concentration should be at a guidance level to accomplish the end goal, not too much, whats fair.

title: Made it quick and easy to file my taxes
content: Did what it always does for me. Made it quick and easy to file my taxes. As long as you have all your info to plug in when needed it's easy. I got my Fed back in 7 days and State back in 11 days. What more can you ask for?

title: Look close it changed
content: After cleaning up the mess of Deluxe not doing what Deluxe use to do, it worked great. Have to admit I am concerned what the correct version will cost next year. I have used and liked TurboTax for over 10 years and have loved it.

title: Turbo Tax is awesome!
content: Extremely easy to use. Makes the process easy. We like how it automatically transfers your prior year info into the current year. We like how you can complete at your own pace, entering information as its rec'd in the mail (W-2, 1099s, etc). Will continue to use over the years.

title: ... Tax for over fifteen years and I am well pleased with how easy it has been to navigate the ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax for over fifteen years and I am well pleased with how easy it has been to navigate the program. I think a complete novice can use the program with no problem at all since it walks you through each step.Thank you.

title: TTD is still the best!
content: Have used TTD since I started doing my taxes online. The version I got was great. No problems at all! Fast and easy as always. I didn't need all the other things that TTD does. I was done in record time. Maybe a TTD light could be made? If you want the best, it's TTD.

title: My taxes have got simpler. I was paying a ...
content: My taxes have got simpler. I was paying a CPA $270 to do them. I did them with Turbo in about 1 hour. It was my first time and I had everything written out before hand. I received my refund back in 2 weeks, which was $330 more than last year. I will continue to use Turbo.

title: SAVE TIME AND MONEY....USE TURBO TAX.
content: it's the only one to use in my opinion. Takes you step by step through everything then double checks for mistakes. All you have to do is have your receipts and records ready to enter. I stopped using a CPA years ago and now I'm saving hundreds of dollars every year doing my own taxes.

title: Overall good tax filing software
content: Has good flow, questions are generally self explanatory. What would be helpful is more real world explanations on questionable items. Would like to see a discounted price for the e-file of State. It is pretty expensive to pay for the software and have to pay to E-file state.

title: Seems like there is an error with the city return
content: Seems like there is an error with the city return. Other than that, it is user-friendly. There are help sections in case you aren't sure what a question is asking-- I found this to be very thorough and helpful.

title: for an otherwise great product.
content: Paid full price for product in store and still had to pay for the "free" state refund. Why do people who download the product for FREE online get it all free yet those who buy the product have to pay for the state return. Thats B.S. for an otherwise great product.

title: A fan /user for years.
content: This year it was no different. TT guided me through the federal and state process, filing both documents electrontically, and I received my refunds within a week. I have neever considered using anything other than TT!

title: Very easy to use
content: Very easy to use. However, as a first time user, there were additional costs that were not disclosed. The software title implies that it includes State filing, but no mention of additional cost for filing state forms.

title: ... time to use the TurboTax and the experience was good! Very user friendly although it took time to ...
content: This was my first time to use the TurboTax and the experience was good! Very user friendly although it took time to make sure all the right information gets in. I will definitely use it again next year!! Compared to paying for a tax consultant to do it, I saved a ton of money!!

title: First time I've used this program it seemed easy and I answered all the questions honestly
content: First time I've used this program it seemed easy and I answered all the questions honestly, but don't know, I received a letter that my return is going through a thorough review. I hope this is just a random thing and not a yearly reoccurring situation.

title: Change the interface Intuit for TT
content: Iv'e used Turbo Tax for years. The new interface downright sucks! They need to go back to what worked for years and is easy to use.

title: Just a minor pain in the ass
content: I didn't realize that the deluxe version didn't do stock soles. I borrowed my daughters Turbo Tax version to do stock trades. Then uninstalled her Turbo Tax and reinstalled my deluxe version to finish my taxes. It was a minor pain in the ass, but got the job done.

title: Turbo TAx- Better every Year!
content: There was nothing to prevent me from itemizing, from doing the paperwork, from checking everything to make sure it was correct, and filing it on line in around 2hours. Refund was received in about 8-10 days. This is the fourth year (at least ) that I have used Turbo Tax.

title: Drop in overall quality
content: The quality of the software seems to have fallen the last 2-3 years. This year was the worst yet. I may try H & R Block next year.

title: ... have been using Turbo Tax for years and I like that I can use it for more than one ...
content: We have been using Turbo Tax for years and I like that I can use it for more than one person. This year I did my teens taxes as well. I love that your information transfers from last years to this. And I like that you can be walked through or go through it as you like.

title: Thorough Way To Electronically File Your Taxes!
content: All in all a very thorough way to do taxes. TurboTax reiterates the question if you visit a section that you may not be totally clear on and will double-check with you one more time before closing that section out. Very helpful and thorough.

title: It was easy and I have used it for a number of ...
content: The language seemed easier to understand this year. It was easy and I have used it for a number of years with high satisfaction.

title: I am unable to print my completed returns or my ...
content: I am unable to print my completed returns or my copies, when I seek help none is available program has got more difficult to use.

title: Turbo Tax is Awesome
content: Excellent Program. So easy to use. This is my tenth year using it. No other way to do your taxes quickly, efficiently, easily...and get your refund direct deposited to your bank account. Wouldn't do taxes any other way. Highly recommend to anyone.

title: I'll let you know after my State taxes was accepted ...
content: I'll let you know after my State taxes was accepted and a computer has sent it for a "manual Review" which I'm still waiting for my refund. This was my second time that I had "E filed" my state with Turbo tax, Jerry

title: First year to try Turbo Tax and it was easy, cheap & could do at your own pace ...
content: First year to try Turbo Tax and it was easy, cheap & could do at your own pace & time. In the back of my head I wonder of being audit. I did state everything honestly & truthfully. My friends have used for years and no problems, I will continue to use in years coming.

title: Turbotax wins 7 years in a row
content: I have used TurboTax for 7 years now for several family members as well as myself, with total success, got the best refunds with no challenges from the IRS. I will continue to use this program for as long as I have to pay taxes, (death is the other certainty I believe).

title: Bye bye turbo tax
content: Yes it works but I used it again I guess out of laziness. The cost is now as much as having someone local do it for you. The cost keeps climbing every year with more hidden fees. I'm looking elsewhere next year

title: Unhappy customer, has been a customer for over15 years.
content: Not happy with the way Delux was re-bundled, Not happy with being charged for state tax e-filing and got charged another $34.99 for some other thing I did not need. May look for another software package next year.

title: Decided to try Turbo Tax this year and can say that it couldn't work better or be more user friendly
content: I have stumbled through online tax filing for years on my own. Decided to try Turbo Tax this year and can say that it couldn't work better or be more user friendly. Got done with state and federal in about 90 minutes and had both refunds in two weeks. Good show!

title: Recommended.
content: I don't know what all the complaints are about. This product worked fine and I got the biggest refund in years. Thanks Turbo Tax

title: won't download and open up.
content: I cannot not get the program to download on my desktop. I'd rather they had sent the CD.

title: One Star
content: I was pissed that state was not included so the software ended up costing me about $100.

title: This is truly disgusting and should not be allowed without prior consent
content: I generally use Turbo Tax program but was very disturbed to recently learn that even those customers that kept their information on their desktop computers had their information stored on Intuit servers. This is truly disgusting and should not be allowed without prior consent. I would like to email them about this but no email is available. Very disappointed in this

title: Two Stars
content: overcharged

title: I love turbo tax!
content: I LoveTurboTax! I have very little time to go get my taxes done. so I just do them myself with TurboTax and my refund is just as good as if I would have paid somebody $300 to do them. Turbo tax ask the same questions as a tax place w/out the $300 price tag!!

title: TurboTax is a great product I've been using the last 4 years
content: TurboTax is a great product I've been using the last 4 years. For a numbers-phobic person, they make it very easy and keeps me tracking with what I need to do to take care of my tax return. Thank you!

title: Great program! I have been using TurboTax for many ...
content: Great program! I have been using TurboTax for many years and it just gets better and better. TurboTax makes my life much easier when tax time rolls around each year. It takes the confusion and stress out of doing my taxes.

title: Worst Turbotax ever
content: This was the worst Turbotax ever. I could not even file my state taxes this year. The state of Illinois keeps rejecting them.

title: One Star
content: They suck there is no way to opt out of the audit protection

title: I like it, it is really easy to use
content: I like it , it is really easy to use. The only problem I have is that I paid $50.00 for the software and I thought it was not suppose to cost anything to file the federal taxes, but it did charge a fee. I don't remember it doing that before except on the State tax.

title: Worked just fine other until the end when I filled out the ...
content: Worked just fine other until the end when I filled out the State portion and then was told there was a charge of $29 plus to send it via the internet... What a wake up.... You should tell us about any additional charges in the beginning of the process.

title: ... TurboTax for seven years and have always been very satisfied with the product
content: I used TurboTax for seven years and have always been very satisfied with the product. This year I was not sure what to do about my daughter's collag information. TurboTax explain everything in a simple manner & I was able to get my maximum deduction. Thanks

title: ... Turbo Tax for over 10 years and couldn't be happier. It is simple
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for over 10 years and couldn't be happier. It is simple, answers to any of my questions are readily available and, having had it double checked by others in the past, know they information is accurate.

title: need something in between basic and deluxe
content: We had to pay for deluxe but could only filed standard. This is the second year this has happened. We could use basic but like many baby boomers, we have our house paid for and need to declare the taxes paid on the house. this is the only deduction we have in deluxe.

title: TURBO TAX, NUFF SAID!
content: I GET THIS FROM AMAZON EVERY YEAR AND IT MAKES TAX TIME GO WITHOUT A HITCH OR WORRY. I'M NOT THAT GOOD IN DOING TAXES, BUT TURBO TAX DELUXE GUIDES ME THROUGH AND IF YOU EVER SAW THE FORMS FOR LOUISIANA'S STATE TAXES, YOU'D BE THRILLED YOU HAD TURBO TAX!! NUFF SAID!

title: No longer a Turbotax fan!!
content: TurboTax drove me to the competition this year by switching the schedules each version supports. What I want from a tax software product is consistency from year-to-year. Taxes are complicated enough without having to worry that my tax program is missing some of the capabilities I had last year with the same product. Boo Hiss!!

title: Easy to use
content: Easy to use, asks the proper questions, helps to complete the form. I have used TurboTax for the last five years and tell my friends about it so they can experience the ease in which it is to file income taxes.

title: Nickle and diming skunks. Have used TurboTax for years ...
content: Nickle and diming skunks. Have used TurboTax for years. Not this year or ever again.

title: Why me
content: I have used Turbo Tax for years but I have never bought it from Amazon so I am confused why the request for a review. Since I do not need a professional tax person I think Turbo Tax is the best thing to happen to tax preparation.

title: Turbo Tax Is The Best.
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for many years and I appreciate the help it gives me with my deductions and the ease I have when going from one year to the next. It is always very accurate and makes sure my math is correct along with my use of the required forms.

title: GREAT PROGRAM
content: I enjoy Turbo Tax for sometime now. Some of the explanations, at times, are unclear. I have not seen a better tax program.

title: It was a waste of time and effort
content: Loading a second state program to do my son's tax was a big loss. He only paid $38.98 California tax. Having all the W2 fiigures, Turbotax should have evaluate if it was necessary to download a second state program. It was a waste of time and effort.

title: & feel comfortable with it
content: We have used Turbo Tax for many years, & feel comfortable with it. Although now many questions are asked that are redundant that should be known from info used in returns from previous years, & are also more on the CPA scale type questions. We're still fans.

title: TurboTax is the way to go!
content: It is a no-brainer to use TurboTax! It walks you through everything step-by-step. I wish I said "goodbye" to accountants long ago! My federal refund was received within a week of filing online.

title: Ok, but electronic deposit is too expensive.
content: I like the tax software, but if you want your refund (assuming you get one) to be electronically deposited it will cost you nearly $50. I hate that. Why is it so expensive? I may just go elsewhere next year because of the high cost of electronic deposit.

title: Still the Best
content: obviously some things are now missing from this version of Turbo Tax - which the $25 rebate helped fix. It's still the best product out there for doing your own taxes. I've been using it since 2001. Don't know which version i'll have to buy next year????

title: I received a e-mail; from a TPG called Tax ...
content: I received a e-mail; from a TPG called Tax products Group. They claimed you hired them to take your fees from the tax return. I received 1,000 dollars less than expected. Is this because I pay the estimated taxes for 2014 in January of 2015.

title: Major Problem
content: I had a problem in that the amount of refund I wanted to to apply to next years taxes, and properly entered on Form 1040, was not picked up on the "Estimated Tax Payments Options" form. I had to override to enter the amount I wanted to apply.

title: Better than 2013 version but still needs work
content: Better than 2013 version but still needs work. Sometimes confusing when filing jointly as to when add totals and when to list individually. When you purchase program with state filing why do you ask for additional amount at filing.

title: Have used Turbo Tax for several years and I think it is generally the best.
content: Although there was a problem with the Minnesota Tax return that we needed to wait for a fix, the majority of the program seemed to be easier to use and understand this year. Have used Turbo Tax for several years and I think it is generally the best.

title: Review of TurbTax 2014
content: TurboTax improves their program every year and makes it easier to use. The instructions are easy to follow and cronologically indexed into each segment. Very thorough in walking you through every step in the process.

title: Wow--I can do my taxes and get a bonus with ...
content: Wow--I can do my taxes and get a bonus with it. Everything worked really well and I've already gotten my Amazon.com bonus

title: I was disappointed that I could not e-file my state return this ...
content: I was disappointed that I could not e-file my state return this year in spite of buying the deluxe edition with one state.

title: User friendly until trying to file state taxes and it ...
content: User friendly until trying to file state taxes and it wouldn't work and I eventalked to a person at Turbo Tax for an hour and they couldn't get it to work. I waited a few days and tried to file again with the same result so finally printed and mailed it

title: One Star
content: Paid to eFile and tried multiple times with no success. Finally just filed by mail.

title: Turbo tax is #1 in my book!
content: Turbo Tax is a great software to use during tax time and use during the year for reference. I;ve used Turbo Tax for many years and never had a problem on my returns. I would and I still recommend it to all my family, friends & co-workers. A great product.

title: Ease of use
content: I find the walk-through of all the questions very easy to complete my taxes. The questions aid me in claiming all my deductions. The section dealing with valuating items donated to charities is invaluable in estimating my charitable donations.

title: TurboTax is quick and easy to use
content: I've been using turbotax for quite a few years now and it's always quick and easy. I like the fact that information from the previous year is carried over and saves me some time. I'm done in less then an hour with both sate and federal.

title: have used for years-no more
content: Probably my last year of using Turbo Tax. I need to do an amendment for this year and last because of missed deductions.

title: give it a try!!!
content: very easy to use, just follow the screen prompts. got my returns quickly and for the most I deserved. recommend to anyone who does not want the hassle of doing the paperwork of filling out their taxes.

title: Not worth the frustration
content: slow slow slow. Took forever to download. took forever to start up. Would not import turbo Tax info from previous years. As I typed it was 2-3 seconds before the letters showed up om the screen. When I clicked next it would take 3-7 seconds to go to the next screen. I ininstalled and sent a request to Intuit to refund the purchase price. Other site usually send you a confirmation email. Intuit has not.

title: Good but not flexiable
content: I am a teacher and need to deduct the cost of work expenses and workshops. There is no place to do it, and teachers are only allowed to write off $250 dollars of the money we spend in classroom supplies. We need more options!

title: You have a great product ,quit messing with your customers
content: It does and Excellent job.Quick,easy and efficient. INTUIT NEEDS TO BE BLUNTLY OPEN WITH CONSUMERS WHEN THEY CHANGE THE CONTENTS OF THEIR PRODUCT .The quiet we didn't realize it was a problem statement is a big FAIL !!

title: I had problems getting the CA State automatic efile to ...
content: I had problems getting the CA State automatic efile to work, but I sent in the data by mail for the CA state refund. I understood later that hackers had caused problems with the State version. I am still waiting to receive the refund from the state.

title: Same Old stuff!
content: I have used Turbo tax for over 10 years, and this version (2014 deluxe) seems no different than the last few years. I do miss the set ups at the end of the program to establish new W-4's, and the different scenarios available on earlier versions.

title: May be last year I use Turbo Tax!
content: Have used this product for many, many years. That being said, this is the first year that I found the software riddled with problems, errors, etc. This will make me reconsider my choice of software for doing my taxes next year!

title: and was well pleased with it as always
content: I purchased Turbo Tax Deluxe again this year, as I have for many years, and was well pleased with it as always. I do my federal taxes and those of my grown kids, so my five free returns are used quickly. I do our state returns using the states free online service to avoid fees. Using the online version turned out to be a shocker when I tried to help my nephew and a friend. Abosolutely free did not apply with one having a 1099 Misc and the other iteminzing with no more than his house and his church tithes. My friend opted to mail his to avoid the fees and my nephew (who is a student with a minimal income), needed his money right away and ended up paying what I thought was a hefty fee to have it deducted from his return (fed only - I used the states service for his state return). I was not happy. These returns were pretty simple, basic returns. My friend at work tried using the online version and and his returns were denied 5 times!! I went thru it for him and could see nothing he'd done wrong. We tried without success to find an on line chat link or a phone number to ask questions. Finally I recreated his return on my program usiing my last free efile to help him out. Why is it so hard to contact you guys? I know you TurboTax has to make some money to support themselves, but I was not ready for this big change and was very disappointed

title: Price vs value
content: I've used turbotax for many years, and always valued the product....until now. A product has to be evaluated on its price relative to it's value. It's clear that this year's deluxe version does not fully support schedule D or C as it had in the past. The company says schedule D can be done via using forms, but that is very labor intensive and much more complicated than the previous prompted dialogue method, and the company admits even when that is done it cannot be efiled, so add in the ink, paper and postage to the value equation. I've asked Bob if the 2014 deluxe version can download barter transactions from financial institutions , as the previous version allowed. If so, this would be a big help,That download ability was a value, and itd loss (if lost) would also adversely impact the value equation. It also seems to be pretty clear that full schedule C requires the $99 home and business version--again, another hit to the value proposition of the program, and another inducement to try another product. It is hard then, without a full support for schedule D, and no efiling if you fill the info in via 'forms', and no support for a full schedule C, to justify the price for the upgrades without seriously considering other programs which have retained those features for less price.

title: e-file not free
content: As far as the taxes go, it is great, Makes completing the tax process easy. As far as their ad e-file for free, that is misleading. It cost me about 24 bucks. Not happy with that part. Dr. T

title: Doing my taxes with TurboTax (which I have done for ...
content: Doing my taxes with TurboTax (which I have done for may years) is a pleasure - honest. I know that you know what I don't know about tax issues and what I really don't want to have to know. Thank you,thank you,thank you.

title: I have always been very pleased with it
content: I have used the Turbo Tax for about as long as it has been available. I have always been very pleased with it. Because I am able to transfer info from one year to the next year, it makes my filing so much easier.

title: Inexpensive and very fast!!
content: Using Turbo Tax saved me at least $300. I had been paying a CPA for over 20 years and had been doing most of the work myself. Using Turbo Tax was quick and easy and I received my Federal and State refunds within three weeks!! Tom

title: great product!
content: have used this for the past several years....always had good returns and its REALLY easy to use. it walks you through everything, asks simple questions, and makes suggestions. will continue to use this software!

title: very good program
content: Have used turbo tax for many years. recently used it at same time a tax account did my taxes. After my father's death, taxes were much more involved for two years. Compared Turbotax results to accounts and turbo tax was right on.

title: All's Well
content: It was fine after you decided not to screw us and charge for forms and features that were included in prior editions. I'm glad that you repented because that would have ended my long association with Turbo Tax.

title: I used Turbo Tax years ago and found it helpful ...
content: I used Turbo Tax years ago and found it helpful. Because of business and marriage I started using a CPA. I am now retired and found Turbo Tax even easier to use. Turbo Tax will be my tax preparer next year.

title: I didn't feel like Turbo Tax was as clear and convenient to use ...
content: I didn't feel like Turbo Tax was as clear and convenient to use this year. The IRA distribution section as an example. Also there were no email status reports for my refund. Finally the healthcare insurance coverage section was very confusing.

title: Easy to use
content: Simple. Concise. Easy to use. For an old duffer like me - 66 - it was seamless.

title: Three Stars
content: problems with the software make me, rethink if I will purchase it in the future

title: Turbo Tax 2014 pro and con
content: As always the program just gets easier. The price just keeps going up. I am required to file a Ca. state even though I don't owe anything. I feel that the Turbo Tax Fee to e-file the Ca return is excessive.

title: The thing I like best about TurboTax is that it does all the ...
content: The thing I like best about TurboTax is that it does all the computations for you. That can take up a majority of you time when you're doing your taxes. Not to mention it takes you step by step through every deduction to see if you qualify.

title: Simple questions
content: I am an art person, not a math person. I am amazed that I can do my own taxes with the help of Turbo Tax's lay person vocabulary. The questions are explained and clarified, ie, as in, this is uncommon or unlikely for you to have this.

title: Happy Customer
content: I am very happy with Turbo Tax. I have used it for the last 5 or 6 tax returns. This year is the first year that I e-filed both returns. I have already received my Federal and State refunds. I intend on using Turbo Tax next year. Thank You.

title: The only problem I have is that I don't have ...
content: The only problem I have is that I don't have enough deductions for the long form but still need to report stocks and dividends and stock sales. There is no option to bypass the step-by-step for deductions and go with the standard deduction.

title: Turbo Tax beats H&R Block for ease of use
content: Easy to use , never have had any problems with a return. H&R Block software does not compare with Turbo Tax. I bought H&R because they were out of Turbo Tax. I ended up throwing in the trash and went to another location for Turbo Tax.

title: I have been using TurboTax for about 4 years. ...
content: I have been using TurboTax for about 4 years. Before that I used a CPA. I wish I had gone to TurboTax sooner. It guides you through the process and there are clarification pages available which answered all my questions.

title: ... several years now and find it to be very easy to use and the fact it pull info out ...
content: I have used TurboTax for several years now and find it to be very easy to use and the fact it pull info out of a previous return save me a lot of typing. It's deductible is a real help in determining the value of material good donated.

title: Excellent Tax Software
content: I have used TurboTax to do my own taxes for seven years now and it has been the absolute best software package. It's very easy to use and clearly walks you through each and every step of the filing process. I would recommend it to anyone!

title: Not happy with the processing this year
content: Not happy with the processing this year. Needed certain code number for Federal filing but no space available. You space for your code but some of us have been compromised and must IRS code. So now must mail.

title: Greed is a terrible thing. P
content: Imagine my surprise when TTax demanded another $30 to handle schedule K1. This, after years of performing that task using the Deluxe version. Greed is a terrible thing. P.J.Ferrell Port Ludlow, WA ***

title: I was not happy about the extra expense
content: I was forced to buy the deluxe this year to cover my small business needs. I was not happy about the extra expense. Hopefully this will be remedied by next year. I liked the lay out of the program and found it easy to use.

title: Beware using the State E-File Service.
content: Simple to use but disappointed with the State e-file. Entered credit card number to pay the $19.99 then it did one more check and found I could not e-file the State return had to submit paper return. Of course TurboTax got their $19.99.

title: i love turbo tax and have been using it for years
content: i love turbo tax and have been using it for years. i use it "inbetween" tax times to calculate how investments would impact next year's filings. my only negative.........turbo tax, why don't you accept pay pal?????????

title: The federal part of it was just fine, the Illinois part of it was absolutely terrible ...
content: The federal part of it was just fine, the Illinois part of it was absolutely terrible and would never do it again.

title: ... product 2 years in a row and am very pleased. My federal return is e-filed
content: I have used the product 2 years in a row and am very pleased. My federal return is e-filed. I mail my state on in; however, my refunds come quicker than normal. The product covers all bases so that I am sure my return is accurate.

title: More of a need than I'd prefer...
content: A need more than I'd prefer, but, I decided to deduct expenses for my "business" as a professional musician, and considering the items I wrote off, I got a HUGE return. This did make that process easier.

title: Could only be better if it was free.
content: I've used it for over 10 years now. It's smart and does all the work. I'm not and just answer questions. It remembers me and my data from the previous years. Its so easy and I've never been audited. Couldn't be better.

title: NOT FREE
content: Too expensive!

title: Two Stars
content: Very expensive

title: It worked great and did everything I needed it too
content: It worked great and did everything I needed it too. Easy to follow and I like the comparison to last years return as I progressed, to check my work. The final Print screen was a little confusing but I got it done.

title: H&R Block problems
content: I heeded the warnings and did not purchase Turbo Tax this year. I purchased H&R Block Deluxe and had a great number of problems trying to enter in-kind charitable contributions. Block claims to carryover last year's entries from Turbo Tax, but if you attempt to edit and bring up to date, all the information disappears. It must be re-entered. Long wait to speak to customer service and the agents did not know how to solve the problem. They shuffled me into oblivion. So be aware. I need to add that I felt compelled to purchase Turbo Tax to reuse all my past data since H&R Block can't, despite their claim to the contrary.

title: I was disappointed when it looked like I would have to upgrade ...
content: Initially, I was disappointed when it looked like I would have to upgrade to the premiere version just for the sale of a house. For 2014, Turbo Tax upgraded for free. Not sure what 2015 will bring...

title: Mission Accomplished
content: I accomplished the task and e-filed both returns But for some reason it didn't go as smoothly as in prior years. I didn't find the new version as easy as the prior version. Will I continue to use Turbo tax? Most definitely!

title: HSA section
content: I was very disappointed with the section on HSA....much too confusing for basically an easy deduction. Unless next year's edition has some changes ..I will use another tax software. I have used turbo tax for more than a few years now,

title: it was ok more confusing than 2013 which I never ...
content: it was ok more confusing than 2013 which I never could get moved over to my new computer. was not impressed

title: Great product.
content: I would not do my Taxes without Turbo Tax Deluxe. I don't have to worry about unwittingly omitting items or making simple math errors. I e-filed my federal return & had my refund (direct deposit) within a week.

title: Pleased
content: I have found Torbo Tax improves every year. I always get the Deluve Version. Having Turbo Tax "Walk You Through" is the way to go. It is best utilized if you get all of your documents in order before you begin.

title: I consider Turbo Tax to be the best tax preparation software you can purchase for the money
content: We have used Turbo Tax for several years and have never had a problem. I consider Turbo Tax to be the best tax preparation software you can purchase for the money. It is easy and simple, anyone can use it. Thanks for a great product.

title: ... Turbo Tax for many years and I really am pleased with its ease of use
content: I have used Turbo Tax for many years and I really am pleased with its ease of use. I have tried others, but I always come back to Turbo Tax because I can do my taxes without running into problems with the software.

title: Why pay premium for e-filing?
content: disappointing that after paying extra to file state return electronically, still must mail hard copies of W-2 and 1099 forms to Pennsylvania Department of Revenue. I shall request a return from TurboTax in the amount of $19.00

title: This was the best decision that was made and it was actually very ...
content: First time I have done taxes myself. I have always taken them somewhere to be completed. This was the best decision that was made and it was actually very easy. Loved this program and will use it again next year.

title: ... have been using Turbo Tax for many years and like it. This year
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for many years and like it. This year, though, I was not too happy as I was finishing up my taxes. The Printing and E-filing and E-filing versus Paper filing was not as smooth as in the past.

title: The program functioned easily, and the intragrated help worked well
content: The program functioned easily, and the intragrated help worked well. I was not happy about the change in availability of the basic program from years past, but TurboTax made ammenda by including a free stata program.

title: Great Program
content: Have been using Turbo Tax for about 8 years, its is very easy to input data, and they transfer your last year data to the new forms. Recommend for anyone and you do not have to be a computer genius to use the program.

title: I did not enjoy the fact that I had to get a patch ...
content: I did not enjoy the fact that I had to get a patch to download the updates.I spent more time trying to get the updates than completing my taxes. It should be an easy to use program and has been in the past.

title: Not completely happy.
content: Software was easy to use and the directions were easy to follow. I am upset that I had to pay a fee to transmit my return to both the federal and state. I thought once I bought the software I would not owe any more money!

title: Confident for next year
content: I found this version easy to navigate and very intuitive. I certainly plan to continue with TTax as the results yoeld a confident filing and I am already set to start next year with the automatic transfer of data.

title: Highly recommended!!
content: Finally, it's actually fun to do my taxes! Very easy to navigate with the step by step tutorial.And about half the cost of having my returns professionally prepared.One free State return included and only $20 extra to e-file it.

title: Fun and easy to use!
content: The 3rd year of using TurboTax. I am sold on this. I can stop, change, and take my time doing my taxes. I don't have to worry about stupid formulas and all the IRS stuff. Worth every penny in my book.

title: Yearly user though a little hesitant with early publicity regarding ...
content: Yearly user though a little hesitant with early publicity regarding the "basic" et. all.. Used the program in filing again this year and expect that this relationship will transcend to the next tax reporting time.

title: TurboTax
content: Did not buy from Amazon, bought from Costco, but it worked just fine for us, this year & many in the past...

title: and it is still better than paying someone else to do my taxes
content: I've used TurboTax for years, and it is still better than paying someone else to do my taxes, but I didn't think it was as smooth a flow this year as compared to other years. Not quite as intuitive from Intuit!

title: Had a good experience filing our joint own tax returns
content: First time user. Had a good experience filing our joint own tax returns. look forward to an even easier time with it next year as the base data will already be in the system. Saved me almost $600 of CPA fees.

title: Turbo Tax is so easy to use
content: Love Turbo Tax. Although, filing taxes are not my favorite thing to do, turbo tax makes doing taxes so easy. The questions are stated so anyone can understand and answer them. I love the "explain this" options.

title: AMAZING software. Never in my life did I think ...
content: AMAZING software. Never in my life did I think I would enjoy doing my taxes. But the ease and simplicity of this software made the arduous task of preparing my taxes a breeze. I was blown away. Great product!

title: Disappointed
content: I think Intuit missed the boat this year making the changes and not anouncing the changes. I have serious doubts about using it next year. Seems to me that it was just a way to sell the higher priced addition

title: Fast and easy to use
content: Fast and easy to use. Walks you thur almost all situations and if not you can call Intuit for help from a tax specialist. I have used it for 8 years now and always feel i get the best refund. Taxes done right.!

title: TURBO TAX DELUXE
content: We have used Turbo Tax Deluxe the last 6 years and we think it is the best. We have no had any problems when we submitted our returns to the IRS. Great program and will continue to use it in the future

title: overall a good product. Some things were not explained as well
content: overall a good product. Some things were not explained as well. It would be nice if there was a tool that you can use that just asks you; What tax forms do you have? Then you can select 1040, 1099, 1098 etc.

title: Turbo Tax was very easy to use
content: Turbo Tax was very easy to use. It gives you step by step instructions as one goes thru it. With the use of E-File refund was delivered to bank in 5 business days. o bad E File for State costs @20.00 extra.

title: ****That was simple
content: Can not understand why someone would pay someone else to prepare taxes when that someone else is surely using TurboTax.... If you are supplying the details to the someone else, why not save the $ and do it yourself? Really.

title: Worked well importing prior years data. Had problem with ...
content: Worked well importing prior years data. Had problem with a Ma worksheet that even the expert could figure out why it happened. 2 levels of help got me through it. Took a while, but the people were very helpful and professional.

title: State Tax Filing is too expensive.
content: It does what its expected of it. I wish they had lower costs for State filing. I had to get 2 additional states because of a move. I work in one state and live in another and moved from another state.

title: GREAT
content: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00NG7JVSQ/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_5 Works great, as usual.

title: How Easy Was That?!?!
content: Your software is incredible! A child could complete a tax return if they had the info needed to plug in. This is my third time using TurboTax and I will NEVER use any other software or tax preparation service again.

title: After many years using brick and mortar tax services, ...
content: After many years using brick and mortar tax services, I gave TurboTax a try. I have special deductions with my job that the others always had trouble with. TurboTax was a breeze in every way at a third the cost!

title: TurboTax Shines
content: As always TurboTax makes the tax preparation very easy. And free online efiling. I have been a user for 10 or 11 years. I will continue using this every year that I file a return. Can not be easier than TurboTax.

title: ... over 20 years and found it to be an excellent means to complete my tax returns
content: Have used Turbo Tax for over 20 years and found it to be an excellent means to complete my tax returns, however the negative impact over the exclusion of a portion of the program for 2014 was most unsettling.

title: My filing was great - I have already recived my tax rebate back
content: My filing was great - I have already recived my tax rebate back. However, I received several emails and was told that I should have received a dicount on my purchase of Turbo Tax. Is that possible? Thanks

title: Two Stars
content: Too expensive

title: The Way to file.
content: Worked out just fine and gave me instructions on what to fill out and include. Let me file several ways to find out which way would give me the greatest return. Much cheaper than having someone else do it for me.

title: NIckel & Diming Must Stop
content: You need to create two new versions DX+1 = Deluxe version plus one state free including e-file DX+2 = Deluxe version plus 2 States free including e-file Then you can stop all the nickel-and-diming.

title: Very easy to understand and follow
content: I have used turbo tax for the last 5 years. Where I use to sit and wait impatiently on a CPA, I don't anymore. I never thought it would be this simple that I could do it myself. It goes through every deduction step by step.

title: Four Stars
content: I had no problems with the software or the download. It contained all the screens needed for my return.

title: Good as always; if missing forms not in Deluxe next year, won't be back
content: Easy to use as always. I needed the free Premier update as I've always used the missing forms in past years. If the forms are not included in the deluxe package next year I will change to another product

title: Bad form TurboTax
content: TurboTax certainly does the job with clear and concise tutorials, but very unhappy with the "hidden" cost to complete the filings this year. Bad form TurboTax! Did I mention my concern about the data security leak?

title: I like it and I use it
content: I like it and I use it, but TT changed the Deluxe Version this year so that I will have to purchase an upgraded version to do my small home business that is only a few thousand dollars per year. So I may change next year.

title: Glad I went straight to my states web site
content: state return was way off. Glad I went straight to my states web site.

title: Could not E-file state, I also found this years ...
content: Could not E-file state, I also found this years Deluxe was a little confusing from previous years. They did eliminate a few forms and one that was required to file with state. Don't know if I will use TurboTax next year.

title: We have used TurboTax for about 12 or more years ...
content: We have used TurboTax for about 12 or more years. After the cost of tax preparers continued to go through the roof Turbotax became the logical choice. The cost is reasonable and the process isn't overly difficult.

title: With the supplement (free) package, the program performed the ...
content: With the supplement (free) package, the program performed the same as before (2013, 2012, 2011, etc...). That's why I continue to use it. Making changes that reduce the scope of the Deluxe edition are NOT appreciated.

title: This program walks me through all the steps to preparing ...
content: This program walks me through all the steps to preparing a final tax return. Then the e-file works well to get almost instantaneous deposits in my bank. This is the fourth year I've used TurboTax and I'll continue.

title: TurboTax
content: Very easy-to-use.only issue is state tax has not been sent because of problems with computer hackers.

title: I like the clarity and the depth of questioning when putting ...
content: I like the clarity and the depth of questioning when putting in expenditures and investments. I also like the comparison with short form tax deductions versus itemized deductions to see which serves you best.

title: TTX is fine for calculating tax and providing for E-File service
content: TTX is fine for calculating tax and providing for E-File service. However, I found it impossible to print out forms for my personal file. I tried out everything i know to print the forms and nothing worked.

title: I'm dissappointed that Turbo Tax charges a $34. 99 ...
content: I'm dissappointed that Turbo Tax charges a $34.99 fee to e-file state returns after purchasing the tax package. I file my state returns in the mail and will do so as long as Turbo Tax charges these rediculous fees

title: Turbo Tax worked pretty efficiently for me with little or no issues
content: Turbo Tax worked pretty efficiently for me with little or no issues.I was concerned about problems with security and having to purchase higher program to complete tax. None of these problems surfaced for me.

title: You took a good product and attempted to fiddle with
