title: Three Stars
content: I did not get a FREE state return at all ???

title: easy will use again
content: easy to use and help find all of my discounts

title: TurboTax as usual made filing a very simple event for ...
content: TurboTax as usual made filing a very simple event for me because my income from any work or investments was zero and the only withholding was from my 401k's required after the age of 70.5 years. I have been using it for many years and have had no problem following the software instructions. Digging up the data for determining whether to use the standard deduction involved only asking my quicken software to produce a few simple printouts of deduction data. the one thing that was obvious this year was that electronic filing was not as swift as it used to be. I had to wait 21 days to get my refund deposited in the bank which was a surprise. I feel that this was due to the IRS having issues but I do not feel that TurboTax was responsible for the delay.

title: For many years we have been very happy with it but this years version did not work ...
content: My husband and I have been using Turbo Tax for about 30 years and the 2014 version is lousy. For many years we have been very happy with it but this years version did not work at all for us.

title: I loved the way I was guided through each and every ...
content: I had a different kind of year and had different circumstances and worried about being able to do my taxes correctly. I loved the way I was guided through each and every step and then asked again if I was sure about certain things and allowed me to go back and research and double check my answers. I love turbo tax. I do not know why I worried for 2 weeks wondering if it would go though. It was so thorough with me and If I had any questions I was able to click on the blue highlighted word and get more of an explanation of what was expected and what the law was. I am completely happy with turbo tax and yes I will buy it again next year.! I am not even good at math but they do all that for me. I would recommend it to everyone.

title: Easiest Ever
content: This was the easiest version of TurboTax ever. I've been using TurboTax for over 15 years and this year was be far the best. My returns (both Federal and State) are already in the bank. There were some bad press because Intuit moved some features to the more expensive version but it didn't affect me this year. They should have been more upfront about the changes they made, but they did offer me a rebate if I had needed the more expensive version. It wasn't a problem in my case, but you should pay attention if you have more complex tax returns.

title: Four Stars
content: It requires me to pay for the State filing.

title: Turbo Tax Deluxe...I already have my returns....
content: Easy to use...and would recommend to others

title: Getting Better every year.
content: I have been using Turbo Tax since 1992, so have seen it evolve over the years. This year's version is pretty good, but it still has a few places where one is left scratching one's head. It does not do a good job of leading one step-by-step through dealing with farm income. The Oregon State return fails to account for the portion of military retirement income that is non-taxable (although the 2014 version came closer to doing this than any previous version, so there is at least some progress).

title: The Turbo Tax went smooth. I got paid fast ...
content: The Turbo Tax went smooth. I got paid fast from the Federal government. I got ripped off for $110 because Amazon and Turbo tax won't issue the gift cards. Don't get the gift card.

title: The first time through any new software presentation is done ...
content: The first time through any new software presentation is done with some trepdation, which is reflected in most new learning situations. The first time through Turbo Tax was NOT onerous, and our taxes were completed in one sitting. It naturally took some time, but as we progressed through the modules, more confidence was gained with the completion of each set. The results were outstanding. Familiarity the last two years has caused presentation time to be greatly diminished, which actually made doing taxes a pleasue instead of a huge drag. Thank you Intuit for the lucid mode of tax preparation, which even "non-geeks" can usefully employ and feel complete security of application.

title: It simply is NOT as easy as before
content: Even though it was much harder than prior years, I was able to finish my taxes and get a $2000 refund using Turbo Tax. It simply is NOT as easy as before, and very hard to find where you left off during your work. And even though I used the same computer as last year the program could NOT find last years data. Why? But the program does find all your legal deductions and does a great job of figuring out retirement funds/programs. I will use Turbo Tax next year, hope they go back to the 2012 format.

title: Four Stars
content: Good Value

title: Don't get screwed by your Taxman
content: For years I was afraid to do my own taxes for fear of screwing up & getting audited! (Nobody wants that!) But many people said it was easy because of step-by-step instructions, so I decided to give it a go. This is the first time in about 10 years that I'm getting money back & I'm not making any more or less money, nor do I have more deductions. Bottom line, I've been paying some jerkoff big $$ only to send the IRS a thousand dollars or more every year! So glad I tried this.

title: We were very disappointed that if we wanted to file our state taxes ...
content: The Turbo Tax Deluxe is easier to use now than it was a couple of years ago. We were very disappointed that if we wanted to file our state taxes we would have to pay an additional $19.95. If we wanted to have that amount taken from our refund it would be an additional $39.95! That's outrageous!

title: Deluxe Fits Our Family Well
content: Our family has been using Turbo Tax for well over a decade and it hasn't let us down. With its step by step walk through doesn't leave you much room to make mistakes. The Deluxe version fits well with those individuals that like to itemize and Turbo Tax will let you know if the standard/itemized will get you a bigger deduction. Always like that it imports your information in from your prior years return. Gives you a great snapshot of what has changed over the following year. Will continue to use this product.

title: No complaints here!
content: Note: I'm not in a state where there is a state income tax. TurboTax rightly shut their state e-file capability down, based on rampant fraud on the part of their product users. So, anyway....First time user, but my brother has used it for a decade. I followed his lead, and was very pleased indeed with this product. It was easy to long-schedule with, e-file, and I had my refund in a week. I also signed up for the audit protection, even though the audit meter had me at almost the lowest it could read.

title: Turbo Tax is easy, fast and get money back
content: Turbo Tax is easy, fast and get money back. I had stopped using TurboTax for 2 years and had a very popular tax service do them instead. Well I had to pay both of those years. I have been back with Turbo Tax for 3 years and have been happy with my returns and I will continue to be loyal to Turbo Tax for the future.

title: Five Stars
content: There is nothing like it - Off the Hook!

title: Three Stars
content: The prior year's format was much better.

title: Great decision to use TurboTax
content: This is my second year of using Turbo Tax. Even easier than last year because you moved most of the info over from last years filing. Previously I had been using a tax accountant to file my taxes and the costs were always over $200. With Turbo Tax I spent $49.99 and filed as soon as I received all my needed documents (1099's and the like). My tax refund was sitting in my bank account before the end of February. Turbo Tax is easy to use even for someone that is not accomplished on the computer because you ask all the questions and all I had to do was answer them. And yes, I will be using Turbo Tax again next year. By the way, I also did my father-in-law's taxes too!

title: ... for the past several years and have not been disappointed. For tax year 2014
content: I've relied on TurboTax Deluxe for the past several years and have not been disappointed. For tax year 2014, I've already received my refunds from both IRS and state. I do realize there was controversy this year due to TurboTax's altering the various forms available in Deluxe (I only need Schedules A and B and so was unaffected by the changes), but based on emails they've sent to users, it seems they've done the right thing and rectified the situation. All in all, I give TurboTax an "A"; it's easy to navigate and, most importantly, it's accurate. Highly recommended.

title: I highly recommend Turbo Tax for anyone who likes to take charge ...
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for over twenty years now, and I have never had a negative issue with calculating my taxes, submittal of correct tax forms and worksheets, or receiving my refunds. In fact, I complete my tax computations and receive my refunds faster than any other tax completion service that I have ever tried. Turbo Tax provides me with the comprehension of the new tax rules and laws while gaining a full understanding of my tax and financial situation. I highly recommend Turbo Tax for anyone who likes to take charge of their own situations and stay fully informed of their financial prospects and responsibilities.

title: TurboTax Stepped Up to the Plate!
content: I have used TurboTax for a long time and was initially very disappointed that TurboTax downgraded the Deluxe version. I bought H&R Block and found it very clunky to use compared to TurboTax. Once TurboTax offered the free upgrade to Premier if you used TurboTax last year (which I did), I immediately bought TurboTax Deluxe and once my files were transferred from last year, TurboTax noted that I needed Premier to file the same forms and the free automatic upgrade was quick and easy. I couldn't be happier. Once TurboTax found they had some very disappointed clients, they stepped up to the plate and did the right thing.

title: TurboTax beats them all.
content: I like TurboTax Deluxe because it is relatively easy to use. Most of the questions are supplemented with an explanation, definition, of the terms. I also like that the program is updated so you always have the most current form and information. I think the cost of the state return should be included in the price rather than having to pay extra when you are ready to file. This year I did my granddaughter's return using Freedom TurboTax. I was very pleased to be able to get the federal and state return on the same site and that it was free. I tried other programs, but I think TurboTax is the best.

title: First time TurboTax user
content: I've never done our taxes in the past. Tax time was always a stressful time for my husband, who would gather all the necessary information to bring to our CPA, so I was expecting this to be a lot more difficult than it was. There were a few places that I had to click the "help" button in order to understand a particular entry, but for the most part, I was easily able to sail through the entire process. TurboTax let me know exactly which papers I would need for each section, and asked all the pertinent questions to make certain that I received the maximum refund. We will be using TurboTax from now on.

title: Terrible.
content: No state included this year! Terrible.

title: Easy Peasey
content: It worked great with no issues at all.

title: Five Stars
content: Thank you

title: I like the ease of doing my tax filing with Turbo ...
content: I like the ease of doing my tax filing with Turbo Tax. I think that Turbo Tax made a bad mistake by shuffling the different schedules in the packages they have been selling for years. This was obviously a ploy to make people upgrade to the next level. It is not so bad that they changed their marketing plan, but the way they did it. It's like buying a Ford Mustang every 5 years and then this year you buy a new one and before you can drive it off the showroom floor, they tell you that you have to upgrade to the next model if you want an engine with the car.

title: I found it relatively easy to use and
content: This was my first time using this program. I found it relatively easy to use and, for the most part, it proceeded in a logical manner. I had two questions while trying to complete our Federal & State returns. These were answered professionally by one of your associates. I would suggest that when the returns are partially complete--say 25%, 50% and 75%--that you are able to review your input rather than waiting until the end. This comment applies more to the State Tax return than the Federal Tax return. There seems to be some problem receiving a refund from the State whereas I got our Federal refund within a week.

title: Done in an hour
content: I love this software.m it has made doing taxes easy. I didn't give it 5 stars because the "Itu Deductable" add on would be better if it would include business and medical expenses in addition to charitable contributions. Recording my contributions as I make them makes that part of taxes really easy. It remembers what you entered last year, so you don't have to re-enter basic information and get reminded of investments and many deductions. It really is stress-free taxes.

title: Thank you
content: TurboTax is getting so complicated almost more than a normal user can navigate. But, I have to say that I had three questions this year, most of them relating to the conversion to the Pennsylvania State return. TurboTax has never been able to get PA correct in the 14 or 15 years I have been using it. I spoke with 3 outstanding counselors with TurboTax and hope that they get cudos for their responses to users. They are Harvey, Gerald and Donna. They are good representatives for TurboTax and I couldn't have gotten along without their advice. Carolyn

title: Not happy that they took out the section for reporting withdrawl's ...
content: Not happy that they took out the section for reporting withdrawl's from stocks. I had to pay an extra $30 just for that one item, shame on you Turbotax

title: I Wish We Had Started Using TurboTax Years Ago!
content: Until the year 2009, my wife and I always had to pay someone between $130 to $200 to do our taxes. Now we use Turbo Tax Deluxe to do our taxes each year. Using TurboTax walks you thru each step, personal information, income, & deductions. TurboTax makes it so very simple, even my wife and I have very little problems doing our very own taxes. We highly recommend TurboTax to anyone who has access to their own computer. And did I mention you can Efile both Federal & State returns. Try TurboTax, you won't be sorry you did!

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Fed + State + Fed Efile Tax Software
content: As a longtime customer, we purchased the deluxe edition. After running the program we saw it was missing the ability to e-file plus a lot of forms were missing. After calling customer service, we were told we would have to upgrade, but would receive a rebate when we filed. The product itself is excellent, but sneaking in a price change by shorting the product was a low level marketing decision. Now only did we have to waste time on a Help Desk call, we lost trust in the company that can easily tap into our personal data. Next year we plan to give Block a try.

title: ... using Turbo Tax for many years and I truly love the program
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for many years and I truly love the program. It is easy to understand and maneuver. I have never encountered and problems up to this point. The only thing that has me worried this year (2014 tax year) is the rumor that the program has been compromised. People I know in Utah have tried to file their taxes with Turbo Tax only to be told that they had already been filed. Personal information was not secure and could be used for next years taxes. When I called Turbo Tax they assured me nothing had happened. It just makes me wonder if I should use the program next year.

title: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to use
content: I was paying $225 to get my taxes done from a CPA. I decided this year I would try Turbo tax. I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to use. It took me about 2 hours to go from start to finish because I was being VERY careful that I was reading the questions thoroughly, etc. My refund was within a few dollars of what it was when the CPA did it so I would recommend this to anyone thinking about do their own taxes!!

title: Great Way to do your Taxes
content: Have been using Turbo Tax for over 10 years with great success, my daughter started doing my taxes and 4 years ago I decided to try it on my own. I can't believe how friendly and easy you make it for us who don't like trying new things and venturing out of the box. All my children and grand-children use Turbo Tax every year and we all are happy. Thank you Turbo Tax for making life easy for us. Beatriz Rowe

title: TurboTax! Use it and you will become a satisfied user!
content: I have been a user of TT for a number of years and truly enjoy the program format, the excellent manner in which the program goes into details to assist the user and, finally, the agreement that TT makes to guarantee accuracy and expert assistance by professionals in the event of IRS inquiries. I highly recommend TT to anyone who wants to achieve the best possible tax return for both federal and state requirements. Anyone using the program will enjoy the ease of use and definitely the final results in filing and rebates!

title: tax assistant
content: it works

title: Highly recommended. Easy to use
content: Highly recommended. Easy to use. Fast refund. All you have to do is insert the disk, follow the instructions and fill in the information. It's that simple. No matter what your tax situation may be, Turbo has it covered. Also provides the option for "audit protection". Worth every penny. Most importantly, it removes the drudgery of filing the state form. Turbo does it for you.

title: Four Stars
content: It appears to have done the job.

title: Five Stars
content: Amazing software, very accurate.

title: Lovin' it
content: I've used Turbo Tax for several years now. It seems Intuit keeps getting better with their software. They've made it very easy to file with all their recommendations, etc. Let's not forget Amazon.com with their software download capability. Great job to both.

title: Other than that I love using TurboTax
content: I used TurboTax this year to file my state and federal taxes (2014). I was somewhat confused about which one to buy because the label changed from 2013. All went well until I got to where I was to enter my credit card to transmit my state tax ...some kind of a glitch prevented me from doing this. I called the TurboTax phone number to talk to a representative but after waiting twenty-five minutes on hold I decided to allow the payment to come out of my return. Other than that I love using TurboTax. I will use it again next year.

title: First Time User - Success!
content: First time user. Took a tiny bit of getting used to, but I was able to quickly figure it out and moved very smoothly through it. I liked how it kept me appraised as to how much I owed, which then moved to how much my refund was going to be. The best parts, however, was having both my federal and state taxes done by January 31st. I had my state refund less than a week alter, and federal was less than 2 weeks after I electronically filed. I'll most likely use it again next year.

title: Three Stars
content: Too expensive for my situation.

title: Great software
content: Great software product. I have used this product for years and it has provided an easy way to prepare my taxes. After reading a lot of negative comments I was initially reluctant, but I looked at the matrix of product offerings and compared to my needs - selected the appropriate product, "deluxe" and everything was fine. Only wish I received the money kickback the complainers got from Turbotax.

title: I have used Turbo Tax for many years in preparing ...
content: I have used Turbo Tax for many years in preparing my tax and my children's. I have never had a problem, and I rely on them to find me every deduction and to keep me straight on what I can claim and what I can't. I will continue to use Turbo Tax as long as I file taxes. I am 80 years old and have no trouble understanding the data and moving through the information. I also appreciate the fact that all your information is brought forward each year, so you do not have to enter all your personal information again.

title: Suggest you call Intuit before getting upset or changing software
content: Before anyone lets themselves get as upset as I was over the Turbo Tax changes, I would strongly suggest that you place a call to Intuit's customer service line. Believe me I was extremely upset over their software changes and I placed a call to Intuit intending on strongly voicing my displeasure. However, by the time the call ended, I immediately decided to remain a loyal Turbo Tax customer. Not only did they address my issue to my satisfaction, they took full responsibility for their error and sincerely apologized for the issue. I am retired from GE where I held a Direct of Service position. I have considerable experience in Customer satisfaction and am very capable of identifying the difference between a standard boiler plate apology message verse a sincere effort to "make the situation right" and Intuit truly did make it right in my case. Again, I suggest that you place a call to Intuit and you be pleasantly surprised with the results.

title: I feel turbo tax charges too much for e file ...
content: I feel turbo tax charges too much for e file. If you file federal and state at the same time, there should be one low fee.

title: I have been using Turbo tax for years. There ...
content: I have been using Turbo tax for years. There is not other tax program that I would ever use. They take you step by step and you have many chances to return to areas to recheck to make sure to entered correctly. Years a go, many years ago, I went to a local tax company and they were horrid. They messed up my taxes big time. When I contacted their home office I was able to get my money back. That's when I started using Turbo tax and I will continue to use it.

title: Used it for years and am quite happy with the program
content: Used it for years and am quite happy with the program. I must say that this years version has some new routines that seem more difficult to follow than necessary. Previous years' versions were easier in my opinion.

title: Paid for something I did not receive, a quality product.
content: It seemed to be easy until I started the State tax, then it all went haywire. I ended up calling a tech who had difficulty figuring out how to resolve the issue. After it was all thought to be resolved we found that we had to go back in and change a number of answers that were never asked in the first place. It seemed to have a mind of its own. I paid for a product that was inferior, and quite disappointing.

title: ... used TurboTax for several years & have never been disappointed in the final results
content: I've used TurboTax for several years & have never been disappointed in the final results, although, this year seemed somewhat harder to use than in the past. There are a number of sections that, if not careful, you can easily miss a box to check and greatly change your results. Fortunately, I caught my mistake early on and ended up with good results. I really like the easiness of using Efile and the quick results of getting my refund (less than 3 weeks).

title: Frustrating, but effective.
content: Most probably know the trials TurboTax had this year. Still, it got the job done and they provided the free upgrades.

title: What Taxes?
content: My taxes have never been so easy since I have been using TurboTax. This is the fourth year in a row that I have used it, and it is quick and easy for me to prepare my own taxes this way. It sure beats going to an organization and paying a lot of money. My taxes are done, and both refunds are back to me within a two week period. I love it.

title: State of Michigan sucks
content: TurboTax is a great program. The State of Michigan sucks. They decided to manually check my tax form and will not have an answer for me on the status of my refund until 4/19/2015. This is after e-filing my return on the 29 0f Jan 2015. My tax return was a standard deduction and was filled out using Turbo Tax. How's that for a waste of taxpayers money. I would have been better off mailing my return. I will never e-mail my return to the state again.

title: Tried and True - Easy to Use and Comprehensive
content: I have used TurboTax for over twenty years, first for DOS and since Windows 3.1. It is reliable, comprehensive, great explanations of complicated tax laws, and gives me the option of taking a form-centered approach, or walking me through step-by-step. I tried H&R Block one time, and one time only, two years ago. A mistake that I won't make again.

title: Extra Charge for State Return Hidden
content: I've used Turbo Tax for over ten years, but felt ripped off this year because I was charged an extra $39.99 to transfer Fed return info to state return. In the past the state return was included in the base price of the Deluxe version and the only extra fee was to e-file state return. Thus the price has almost doubled in one year since the 2013 version. This up charge should be noted on the cover of the Deluxe version so buyer knows what to expect in up-charges.

title: So easy to use
content: I have used Turbo Tax for many years and it makes filing taxes seamless year after year. I cannot imagine paying anyone to prepare my taxes when Turbo Tax makes it so easy. I have also used Turbo Tax to plug in different projections for income and taxes for the next filing year to explore different scenarios for withholding and deductions.

title: Don't waste your money on an accountant
content: Best Tax program I have ever used. Everyone should use it. Very easy, even a monkey can use this program. I have been using it for about 6 years now. I have used accountants in the past. They are in a hurry to get your tax preparation done. The quicker they get it done, the more money they make. Turbo Tax is much more thorough with deductions than any accountant I have ever used. I strongly believe I am getting a higher return every year by doing the taxes myself.

title: I would hate to change over to Tax Act or another tax ...
content: As a long time user of TurboTax Deluxe I was displeased that you deleted capital gains gains/ losses on this years tax return. I am looking forward to having to do considerable work in this area in 2015 tax return. Please replace all the items you deleted in 2014 Deluxe return back into the 2015 Deluxe return. I would hate to change over to Tax Act or another tax filing system next year. Aside from that fact I have always been fully satisfied with your product. .

title: Asked the Right Questions!!!!
content: Wasn't thinking clearly late at night while running this program. Thank goodness it asks a lot of questions and I went from owing the federal government $181 to getting back $2700 instead because of daughter's last year of college tuition. You do have to be prepared and have all your tax documents in front of you to input numbers. Will ask for college EIN, bank Federal ID, etc. I've been using Turbo Tax for over 15-years.

title: Don't miss out on using a great tax prep program
content: I was leary about the 2014 version, as there was some negative press about what functions were covered in the Deluxe version, but it worked great. I filed and got my refund, via direct deposit, within two weeks. I am very happy with the results and am glad I took the chance to use this version by ignoring the "bad mouthing" that was going around at the beginning of the year.

title: Turbo Tax made it easy to complete the task
content: Gave it a 4 only because I paid full price and could have gotten $10 off if I had waited for the coupon. As it does every year, Turbo Tax made it easy to complete the task. IRS did not accept our first submission and the software helped us refile after making a correction. It was painless and I appreciate that very much.

title: Best software for users.
content: The best software out there. This is by far the most user friendly software available. I used to use another companies software but it was often frustrating for me, this is very fast and easy to use. My only gripe, the cost has sky rocketed in the past few years. Seriously the price increase is my only complaint.

title: It is easy for me to use and I doubt if I'll ...
content: I've used TurboTax for about 20years now. It is easy for me to use and I doubt if I'll ever change. Previously I went to H&R Block and an accountant, but they were both very expensive and didn't do as well. With Turbo Tax I have time to do it at home and to stop if I need to look for a form, etc. I just began using the electronic file option and it has been so fantastic that I'm overwhelmed. I got my IRS refund within a week--WOW.

title: Easy like Sunday Mornin!
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for about 4 years now and the first year was just as easy as the fourth! Turbo Tax is by far the supreme tax software. Ease of use and excellent help tools make it top of its class. P.S. Much love to the makers of Turbo Tax for quickly rectifying their mistake of redesigning the software.

title: easy to use
content: Simple, easy to use format

title: TurboTax has matured gracefully
content: TurboTax keeps getting better and easier to use every year. I've used TurboTax since 1997, but early versions had various problems such as difficulty in printing, locating items, and confusing directions. The 2014 version was smooth, trouble-free, and fast. I completed my taxes in just a few hours rather than days this year.

title: Great results and easy to use.
content: I have used Turbo tax for years, this year with the comments on what was no longer included, I was not sure. I went ahead and and purchased it any way. As I did not have any of the items that were removed, it worked well for me. I find the software easy to use and I always get a maximum return. I hope this year's problems will be solved, as I would have a problem if I had use other software next year.

title: Easy to do
content: Turbo Tax has made doing, or maybe making sending in my taxes easy. Instead of many page in an envelope and a stamp and signing I can just electronically send them in. I get my refund fast and right to the bank. Although I can no longer use anything except the short form it is still easy. I just wish that I could have a tax program for the EZ form that would allow me to download state tax forms and electronically send in both.

title: Five Stars
content: VERY NICE AND EASY TO USE

title: Dont make it like they used to.
content: I'm a log time user of TT and this year I have problems importing its deductible. its always worked in the past. Same computer and it didn't import my daughter's last year information on her return. I had to rekey it. Not a happy camper at this point. called tech support but don't have hours to wait.

title: Have used for many years dont like the fact you changed deluxe version this year but ...
content: Have used for many years dont like the fact you changed deluxe version this year but changed back with credit. if you dont have deluxe version the same as it is now will consider using something different

title: Five Stars
content: Worked

title: Software was very easy for me to use
content: Doing taxes use to be a hard and complicated job for me. I use to hate it because it would take me forever. Half the time I didn't even know what I was doing! And then I turned to Turbo Tax. Turbo Tax helps me to manage my taxes in a different way. It helps me to stay more organized and makes everything so much easier.

title: Don't buy here
content: Would not download, was not given a refund because of it. Had to purchase another at local store.

title: Another Good Tax Year with Turbo Tax Software
content: Have been using Turbo Tax now for several years and again for 2014 taxes. Found Turbo Tax Deductions and Homeowners to be exactly what was needed to complete and file my federal and state taxes. It is easy to use, very thorough in covering all income and deductions and their review gives assurance that everything listed is done perfectly. Thanks, Turbo Tax!

title: Satisfied first time customer
content: First time user and very happy with my results. This product did exactly what I needed it to. I purchased this product despite a lot of not so great reviews. To these people I say ... your review is supposed to be about this product. Not what this product did last year but not this year. The description clearly states what this product does.

title: I would like the option of seeing all my forms from last ...
content: Each year it seems to be harder to follow. I would like the option of seeing all my forms from last year with space to enter this year's amount. I have used Turbo Tax as long as I can remember, and now retired nothing has changed other than 2 minor additions and each year it takes me longer to fill out the forms.

title: Turbo Tax is still great!
content: Lots of controversy this year with the feature reduction/price increase, but in the end I decided to give Turbo Tax another try. It was, as always, very easy to use and made filing my taxes and getting a large refund simple and painless. I am keeping my fingers crossed that the public relations lessons have been learned by Intuit and things will not be so controversial next year.

title: You get the best price with no hassles and you can download it ...
content: Buying TurboTax thru Amazon Prime is the only way to go. You get the best price with no hassles and you can download it right away and get started with your taxes. It even came with Federal Efile and state tax Efile for a small fee.

title: TurboTax Fan
content: This is my sixth year of using TurboTax and each year it just keeps getting better. It is user friendly and easy to follow and understand. The system simply "takes you by the hand" and leads you through the filing process. Its fast, easy, economical, and efficient.

title: ... used TurboTax for several years and I think it's great. However
content: I've used TurboTax for several years and I think it's great. However, now due to several changes, I don't have enough deductions to go long form; but I like having a state file. The TT basic is about 14.95 and TT deluxe is about 49.95. How about splitting the difference and coming out with a 1040a file with a state, maybe about 29.95? I'm sure you have thought about this, but I thought I would ask!!!

title: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 Worked Fine This Season!!!
content: TurboTax Deluxe 2014 worked perfectly for me this tax season. I had heard all the stories and read the reviews but found that this version had all I needed to file. I did not use the bonus offer; I itemize but did not have capital gains or losses on the sale of individual stocks in 2014. The TurboTax Deluxe handled the dividends and capital gains paid by my mutual funds without a problem.

title: I feel like I am in control
content: With Turbo Tax, I feel like I am in control. I know what records I need to gather in order to complete my return. All the necessary forms and schedules are completed and checked for accuracy by Turbo Tax. What would be a daunting task only takes a few hours and I know what I am sending to the IRS as well as the state. I used Turbo Tax since the 90's and I plan to use it again next year.

title: The process was very easy to follow and questions along the way insured that ...
content: The process was very easy to follow and questions along the way insured that nothing was missed before filing. I have been upset each year when retailers like Wal-Mart discounted the price I paid TurboTax directly via the Internet. If I am paying top price direct, I would think TurboTax would include free filing of the state Income Tax when buying at a higher directly from them.

title: The easiest yet!
content: Downloaded the Turbo Tax software and immediately began my Federal and State tax input. I had already gathered all the materials needed to complete the requirements. This was the 10th year I have used Turbo Tax and found it to be the easiest! From download to filing both State and Federal was less than an hour. Great job for the developers of this years software!

title: Almost a great experience
content: I filed itemized deductions this year and overlooked taking either the sales tax deduction or the state income tax deduction. Why didn't the review process catch that? It's a sizeable amount. I live in Washington state which uses the sales tax deduction. Fortunately my wife, who is definitely not a tax expert caught it before we filed. Could this not be added to the review?

title: Very easy to use for taxes
content: If you're like most people, then you dread tax time. When it comes rolling around, you might even have a hard time. Stop struggling with it and stop paying other people to do your own taxes. Instead manage your taxes easily with TurboTax. That's what I do. I'm glad my friend led me on to this software.

title: I have used TurboTax for years. We owned rental ...
content: I have used TurboTax for years. We owned rental property, our own business and now just a simple tax return. TurboTax walks you through every step. Absolutely anyone that can get on a computer and load the disk can follow TurboTax. I wish other programs were as simple!

title: Turbo Tax is great!
content: It's the best and most user friendly tax software I have ever used. Have been a Turbo Tax customer for at least 10 years and have never had a problem. The questions are direct and lead you in the right direction. Even this year with the mixup, I used Turbo Tax and received the same reliable program and tax return as always. I would highly recommend!

title: Excellent Results
content: It was harder and more difficult to use than Turbo Tax Deluxe 2013, but the results matched Turbo Tax Deluxe 2013 and were excellent. I plan to use Turbo Tax Deluxe 2015 and if experience same or similar problems I intend to look into other Tax Software for 2016. Its too bad Turbo Tax changed its software for 2014.

title: I have been using Turbo Tax for about 8 years ...
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for about 8 years. Previous year's tax info is always saved on my PC which makes for a quick start. I have found Turbo Tax to be very detailed and accurate. Never a problem. Just about anyone should be able to do their tax with this system.And, for the price, you can't beat it.

title: and easy to use
content: I have been using Turbo Tax for over a decade now. It has always had everything I needed to cover as a military retiree, homeowner, 401K, 457b, IRA, my second career, ... This year I had my check deposited in my account in less than 2 weeks. Always clear, simple, and easy to use. Several in my family also use it.

title: A Very Reliable Product
content: I think TurboTax Deluxe is great. The program is intuitive and thus very easy to use. Once you have all of your information loaded, you can complete your taxes in a moderate amount of time and with a high level of certainty that your return was completed successfully.

title: I am not happy with one change this year
content: I am here father and have used Turbo Tax for many years for Tara, My Son and my & my wifes return. I am not happy with one change this year. You've made it more difficult to put investments in than in the past. I am a tax preparer so not including the form required for investment submissions appears to be trying to force me to buy the more advanced version. J. Moore

title: your software was very useful and easy to load
content: your software was very useful and easy to load. My information was tabulated quickly and the professional assistance from your staff make verifying all of my entry's effortless. I have used your products for several years and find them to be very helpful.

title: Super easy and super efficient
content: This was my first year ever doing my taxes myself. Turbo tax made it super easy and it only took about twenty minutes. So much more effient and less costly than going to an accountant or to HR Block.

title: 2015 Taxes
content: I have used Turbo Tax for several years, and it is very User Friendly, even for a Novice like me. I feel confident my taxes are accurate. My refunds arrived very quick, especially the State refund.

title: Taxes made easy
content: Made doing my taxes a breeze. First tune doing them on my own in 17years and it spells everything out for you. Just have all your forms ready. It only took about an hour and mine are semi complicated

title: I don't like the fact that I have to spend more money ...
content: I don't like the fact that I have to spend more money this year for the same stuff that was included in last years deluxe turbo tax. Also state down loads are too expensive .Everything else is fine .

title: Submitting final paperwork my e-file is easy and I get both federal and State refunds back ...
content: My fourth year with Turbo Tax and it gets easilier every year. Submitting final paperwork my e-file is easy and I get both federal and State refunds back in 1 to 2 weeks tops. Last year I had a problem I couldn't understand and I called. I women I talked to was very friendly, helpful, and very polite. I will being using your service for many years to come.

title: Easy to navigate
content: Outstanding application. It improves every year. Easy to navigate, understandable to a financial layman, thorough checking mechanism to maximize likelihood of successful filing. Highly recommend it.

title: The only problem I have is that I would like a little better help section with those questions that ...
content: I have been using TurboTax for several years now and have gotten used to it. The only problem I have is that I would like a little better help section with those questions that creep up every year.

title: Good easy helpful
content: Program very well especially if you used it for previous year's tax. Carries over data from last year and also compares the two years to see if you have done something wrong. Only thing I didn't like was them trying to charge more for Schedule C.

title: Food for thought the size of your company you don't need to cheat the little folks like us.
content: I think not accepting a credit card to pay the $19.95 for the state filing is WRONG! By charging my refund you got $39.95 plus the 19.95. I believe this was on purpose so you could get more money! NOT FAIR perhaps next year we will try one of your competitors. Food for thought the size of your company you don't need to cheat the little folks like us.

title: The 2014 edition did not list charities that I had ...
content: The 2014 edition did not list charities that I had donated to previously even though I have the prior years turbo tax on the computer. It would not let me file electronically with State of Minnesota--I am not sure if that was a Minnesota or Turbo Tax problem.

title: Continuing to use it.....
content: Basically a good program which gets easier with multiple uses. If there is a problem, however, it's tricky getting "into" the forms and to figure out how a particular figure was arrived at.

title: I will continue to use it and have already recommended it to my friends
content: First time user. Everything I was told about the turbo tax is true. Very simple to use, gets you the max return you deserve. I will continue to use it and have already recommended it to my friends.

title: Best out there
content: Very easy to use, makes complicated portions of tax laws simple. Just follow the steps. Have used it in the past and the importing of prior year records reduces importing of repetitive annual info.

title: I disappointed that I cannot access schedule E this year
content: I disappointed that I cannot access schedule E this year. I refuse to pay an extra 30.00 , so I had to do it by hand. Wish I knew about the change before I purchased and installed. Julie Mackley

title: It is pretty easy to use and I'm not that tech smart
content: This is the 3rd year we used Turbo Tax to file both our state and federal taxes. It is pretty easy to use and I'm not that tech smart. My only real complaint is that there is no one to call if you have a question. I searched on line and in the box and could not find a number or email to contact them for questions.

title: Turbo tax download no good
content: Can't even istall Turbo tax is no good and Amazon is no good.

title: Love Turbo Tax
content: I love doing my taxes using Turbo Tax. It is very user friendly and explains any questions I might have. When asked for a certain amount on something or a yes or no question, in italics was an icon to explain this. It was quick and easy! I also had to amend my returns and was able to do that as well very quickly and easily! I love Turbo Tax!!!!í ½í±í±í ½í¸í¸

title: Small Compay Pensions are not IRA's
content: Since I now am 70 1/2 Turbo tax says that all pensions are now required for a Min. withdrawal. Bull S&^%. How do you decide what the total pension funds a company has and I do not own all of it.

title: I love using turbo tax every year
content: I love using turbo tax every year. I get my federal auto-deposited for free and find it's not worth paying $30 for my state refufund so I have that one mailed to me. Makes the who process easier.

title: Sold out Deluxe customers for $30 pieces of silver and greed.

title: service
content: Why I had to upgrade from a deluxe version is the question when I did not need the premium program? I have been using Turbotax for over 15 years and this year is the first time I had to upgrade.

title: Very easy to use
content: Very easy to use. I like that it double-checks everything to make sure I'm not missing out on any tax credits, including those that I may have been eligible for previously, but am not currently.

title: Will purchase again

title: Easiest version yet

title: We got a great refund, and it was somewhat easy to use

The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is that we got through the whole process and then had to purchase an additional feature in order to submit (I don't think that's true for everyone's situation, though.) And, it's not always clear how to go back and fix an errors.

title: Upgraded to meet my needs at no cost. They ...
content: Upgraded to meet my needs at no cost. They realized their mistake of altering the deluxe model and honored their commitment to us. You can't ask for more than that. 5 stars to say the least.

title: I also like the E file feature for both Federal and
content: Turbo Tax Deluxe was very simple to use. I have used Turbo Tax for seven years in a row and will continue to use it in the future. I also like the E file feature for both Federal and State

title: Number one tax assistant guide.

content: I like that I was able to process each of my family's returns. However, I hate that I couldn't use it to process my small business expenses because of the changes made to the Deluxe version.

title: Seriously Review features before you buy
content: Broken Trust. Their 2014 changes (deletions) to the software without notification makes me hesitant to use the software for 2015 -- I do not want any big surprises next year. Be sure to look before you leap as this stuff is NOT inexpensive.

title: Like all else be prepared with the proper
content: As simple as you want even with deductions. Like all else be prepared with the proper? documentation. Also, the process runs quickly and smoothly with the ability to go back to any point.

title: Easy, cost friendly way to compute your taxes.

title: five stars

title: It is so easy to do my taxes

title: Will alway use it.

title: The Best!
content: Have used this product for many years, and find it the easiest to use. It always fits my needs and I love the step by step process for finding the correct information for filing my taxes.

content: Very easy to use and navigate. My only problem, which is a biggie, is that they could not import my W2 from New York State, mine and my husband's employer! Had to enter the data manually.

title: I would recommend it to anyone that wants their taxes done right
content: Turbo Tax takes the worry oput of doing taxes. I have been using it for many years and each year it makes my life easier. I would recommend it to anyone that wants their taxes done right.

Haven't been able to find anymore out about the rebate. Also the survey built in to the software did not work i couldn,t get to but the first three questions and it would proceed no further.

title: Four Stars
content: swell

title: Dedicated TTaxer

I've had to complete amendments and it was simple to do - not taxing at all (no pun intended). It gets easier and more user-friendly as time goes by. Everyone I've recommended this product to loves it and continues to use it.

title: They really need to NOT try to make a buck ...
content: They really need to NOT try to make a buck off their bread and butter. We give them a ton of money for not much work on their end. Do not remove the forms that have always been included!

title: Good Product
content: I Like Turbo Tax, use the deluxe edition. Costs $20.00 to E-File your state return, it was direct deposited the day after I filed. Fast! E-filed the federal return, took almost 3 weeks to get it deposited. Why? Other than that no problems.

title: Wouldn't Do Without It
content: A "looked-forward-to" essential tool at Income Tax time! Works well, easy, professionally presented and makes one feel more like an accountant than they really are! Thank you.

title: Easy to use.

title: TURBO GOOD AS USUAL

content: The program works well for reasonably simple taxes and it's nice to know the likelihood of audits! Too bad the health care program wasn't explained as well at TurboTax guidelines!

title: Great tax program

title: Turbo Tax is the Way to Go!

Doing the taxes myself let's me take my time and review everything I need to, again and again, until I know it's right. Great piece of mind when filing!

content: Been using TurboTax for years and wouldn't change a thing ! Super helpful, walks you through everything. Very user-friendly and easy to navigate. I highly recommend this product !!

title: Bad Decision / Good Response
content: I've been a TurboTax user since 1992 and would always have given this product a 4-star review. Not sure how Intuit makes their business decisions between their mega-problems with Quicken for Mac and now the TurboTax kerfluffle of 2014. Why can't a business just be transparent and say we are going to increase the price of our product rather than the sneaky and underhanded approach they tried this year? HOWEVER, Intuit's decision to do the free upgrade and the ease of completing the upgrade moves the stars from 1 -> 3. This process went very smoothly. I would like to continue to use TurboTax in the future, but will decide next year when I see pricing and features, including the Amazon Bonus for Rebates, which can be a nice benefit if I have a significant refund.

title: ... used Turbo Tax for almost 10 years so I'm pretty comfortable with it
content: I've used Turbo Tax for almost 10 years so I'm pretty comfortable with it. It was great to get a good price and with the download I didn't need to go to the store. I've always been a little disappointed with the state software as those who have used Turbo Tax can attest. While the federal software is full featured with good explanations and guidance, the state process is the Plain-Jane stepchild. The numbers and calculations all work smoothly, but it would be nice to get a little more value in that part of the package. I especially like the seamless "It's Deductible" app for valuing contributions of used clothing and home goods.

title: TurboTax is great

Even if you have to file an amended return it makes that easy also, I had to a couple times. Unless you have a very complicated tax issue I recommend this product.

title: READ THE UPDATE! Long time TT user retreated from jumping ship to HRB and ended up having a trouble free time with TT2014
content: UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE I've changed my rating from four to five stars. You'll just have to read all the comments to find out why. Make sure that you read some of the (currently) well over 2000 1 star reviews as well, as this review reflects my particular experience. Many others did not fare as well as I have and have quite legitimate complaints! UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE As a long time user (13 years... 17 years - I dunno), I was surprised to see the abysmal rating when I went to order TT2014 in late January. I read a bunch of the reviews about the utterly boneheaded, clueless and clumsy move by Intuit (which I won't reiterate for what would be the 2000th time). Decided to check back after the date when Intuit was going to provide the free upgrade for previous years Premiere customers and also spent some time reading reviews about HRB. So... few days ago came back read a bunch more reviews for both products and, after reading enough reviews for HRB where some former TT users were not particularly thrilled with the ease of use of HRB, as well as the various financial incentives that worked for me ($20 off of Norton Security software, which I needed and the somewhat strange offer for an additional 10% kicked in for any part of the refund designated for an Amazon gift card) and made the price difference disappear, I opted for TT. Unlike some others, who had problems getting the free upgrade, filing electronically, and other miscellaneous complaints, I had no problem whatsoever. Filed a 1040 with itemized deductions, some capital gains to report, some IRA dollars to report, some tax break for student loan payments - that is to say, not the simplest return although not particularly complex. Complete the federal using the electronic filing option without a problem. Completed the state form too, and opted to mail it in. I'm in no rush to pay the state the bit of money that I owe them and certainly did not want to pay the $19.99 state filing fee (which is not a fee for using the Turbo Tax state tax preparation option), so will be printing out and mailing those forms. Unlike some of the TT and HRB drones either writing reviews or commenting on reviews, I am an actual, honest to goodness consumer with a few reviews under my belt. While I think that Intuit really made a mess of things and in the process ended up infuriating and losing a lot of customers, they made enough corrections and provided enough financial incentives to lure me back from the precipice. In the end, I had no complaints or problems with the product and the net price after taking into account the assortment of financial discounts and incentives, was significantly less expensive than HRB. I knocked off one star because Intuit simply didn't deserve 5 stars in light of their profoundly stupid business decision. I'll try to respond to what I deem to be any legitimate comments and will completely ignore any comments that I deem to be from TT or HRB drones.

title: No problems
content: I know that others had problems with T-Tax so I was a little wary starting up my taxes. But I had already bought it so I went ahead and did it. I was happy to find that I had no problems doing it and submitting it. I like doing mine quickly as soon as I can so I had both fed and state tax completed and submitted on the 29th of Jan. Within a week and a half I had my state refund deposited and the fed payment was processed. I do have investments but I only have a simple capital gain so I didn't have to upgrade to the next level of T-Tax. That made things easier and I didn't have to get p.o.'d.

title: USE TURBO TAX OR MISS SOMETHING IMPORTANT LIKE A LARGER REFUND
content: THE FASTEST/EASIEST WAY TO DO TAXES. I used to order the IRS publications and carefully go over all the changes making sure I was doing every thing right and getting all the deductions to which we were entitled. Then came Turbo Tax in my computer. They have done all the research and put it in software form. They ask more questions than I can think of and most of them need attention to make sure you get all the deductions. This is the way to do taxes unless you have a very complicated return. I will purchase this software every year just to make sure I don't miss something.

title: TurboTax Review
content: I was asked every time I returned to work on my return for my Tax ID number on my W2 form. At the beginning of filling out my TurboTax, I stated that I did not receive a W2 form, as I am retired and do not receive any W2 forms. They still asked for the Tax ID number several times.This should not have been asked. Also today I received a phone call from someone saying they were from the IRS saying they were trying to contact me as the IRS was going to sue me. They gave me a phone number to call and then hung up. I did not call the number, and am sorry I did not write it down right away. Sounds like some kind of scam going on.

title: Confident tax filing. Minimum tax paid! What is not to like?
content: I have been using TurboTax for over well ten years. It makes my tax filing very straight forward. It remembers all my categories of income and expenses and this reminds me to find these receipts and income reports. This ensures that nothing is left out and all deductions are captured. I am confident in the calculations and the handling of the tax laws, so that I can complete my tax filing in a matter of hours and file. I pay the minimum tax!

title: Easy to use gives you step by step instructions to ...
content: Easy to use gives you step by step instructions to ensure accurate return and most refund. Only two flaws I noticed were there were updates to fix errors in software coming as late as mid-March. I would recommend waiting until at least then to file to make sure you have the recent updates. Second one was it does not update year to year. You must buy Turbotax every year. I feel that for a nominal fee, say $10, they could update it every year instead of forcing you to buy it every year.

title: ... have no complicated tax issues so this product was fine. What I DID NOT LIKE was how sneaky ...
content: I have no complicated tax issues so this product was fine. What I DID NOT LIKE was how sneaky it is about state e-file. It's an additional $19.99 it is not free. That needs to be made explicitly clear on the item details and it is NOT.

title: All went well and I found TurboTax easy to use and accurate
content: All went well and I found TurboTax easy to use and accurate. The 2014 return was the fourth time I've used TurboTax. The only question I have is how do I get the previous year/s to show when I'm working on the current tax year? As I was entering data for year 2014, there was a column to the left marked Tax year 2013 but it was all blank even though I had used Turbo Tax for year 2013. I assume the previous year/s is supposed to show for comparisons?

title: Making tax season a little bit less stressful
content: As long as I can remember TurboTax Deluxe deductions and homeowners has always been my go to tax program, I can always count on TurboTax to be there for my family and I, to ensure that we got the best quality for our money. Even when that meant paying a little bit extra for said TurboTax quality. But again cost is a small price to pay for a brand of Tax filing program that has never let me or my family down. You could say weâre TurboTax people for life

title: I highly recommend it for income tax filing
content: I have used Turbo Tax for many years. The program is both comprehensive and very user friendly. I taught the income tax for preparers course for H & R Block, Inc. before on-line programs were available. This program approaches tax preparation very similarly to going to a preparer's office to have your taxes done. I highly recommend it for income tax filing.

title: Decade of satisfaction
content: Have used TurboTax Deluxe for at least 10 years with complete satisfaction each time. Have never been audited because the program checks the math and possible deductions are fully explained so you know if you're eligible or not. I prepared the same way when I was paying an Enrolled Agent to prepare our taxes, except I was paying 5 times as much to have them done. No brainer to just use TurboTax and save the cost as it is so simple to do.

title: Gets the job done.
content: Been using Turbo Tax for years. This was the first year I had compatibility problems with my computer. Finally got it resolved, but it took a while. Also, it kept asking for my registration info, and would not remember that I had already entered it. Otherwise, I feel like TT gets the job done, eventually. I do like the 10% bonus you get from Amazon if you put your refund on an Amazon gift card. That's a nice feature.

title: I have used TurboTax for years and I like the way your taxes are filled out and the ...
content: I have used TurboTax for years and I like the way your taxes are filled out and the questions that are asked about this years taxes and previous years taxes. I have to use the standard deduction now, but when I had a business income, it was fairly easy to use. You changed the deluxe version this year. If you want to keep me and others as customers, don't let your bean counters have any say on reducing options.

title: I do like, that as a PSO
content: I do like, that as a PSO, Turbo Tax does take into consideration the 3K deduction on page 1 of 1040 so I can file electronically. I do not like the fact that Turbo Tax saves and uses my social security number to determine which edition I bought. If I ever have identity theft or tax refund theft Turbo Tax's security will be the first to blame. Turbo tax please use a different method and do not retain SS#s.

title: Five Stars
content: so easy!

title: Super Easy!
content: Super Easy!! But had to purchase the Premier Edition in order to have forms that I needed for 2014. E-filed Federal with no problems. Will print state and send in mail in order to save the fee. Received $25 check from TurboTax today after I completed info just a few days ago at TurboTax.com/25back. Okay Intuit, think I'll be back next year if you don't make more of those surprise changes!!

title: A Satisfied Customer
content: I have been using this product for a number of years and find it quite easy to use. If I have a problem there is always someone who knows how to handle it. I will most likely continue using it until my finances change and I can file a 1040EZ. Thank you.

title: One Star
content: extra hidden charges

title: Makes filing taxes easy as pie
content: I'm a pretty consistent electronic filer with Turbo Tax. I don't have a lot of complex filing concerns. Each time I've used Turbo Tax, it's done a great job of loading my previous years data and reducing the amount of effort I have to put in as a home owner. The process was simple, smooth and worked perfectly. Unless something drastic occurs, I plan to use it again next year.

title: Outstanding!!!
content: Turbo Tax has never let us down! Efficient, easy to use, thorough, and you will always receive the optimum tax refund...Guaranteed!! Will always count on turbo tax and NEVER use any other program. PS my refund came within a few days, Outstanding service.

title: changes no big deal here
content: Read a lot about the changes in TurboTax for this year and considered switching to something else (I've used TurboTax since 2007). I found the Deluxe just as easy to use as in the past and didn't notice what was missing. I did make sure to read EVERYTHING that was in the product description to make sure I was going to get all the forms I needed. If you're a non-business owner with no investments (other than some IRAs) who likes to itemize, this should be fine for you. Also, I filed state for free, which I don't remember being able to do before.

title: Is perfect. They guide you very easy step by step
content: I give only 5 stars because there are no 10. Is perfect. They guide you very easy step by step. They sent it email; got my Federal return (included in the price) in 1 week, and the State ( you pay extra for that service) in 2 weeks. I used Turbo Tax for a few years; never got any problem. Very easy to do.

title: Easy as always
content: Easy to use as always, guides you through everything. I was worried I might have to upgrade to the next level this year, but it had enough support to deal with my Fidelity account - handled the dividends and such, just wouldn't have handled stock sales.

title: TurboTax works hard so the taxpayers don't have to!
content: TurboTax is an excellent product! Easy to use and they stay on top of updates and changes. The product gets better (easier to use) every year. I have used TurboTax exclusively for 6 years. They do their homework which makes it so easy for me to do my taxes myself!

title: I found it easy to use and easy to file
content: I found it easy to use and easy to file. My one complaint is that it does not tell you what if any paper work needs to mail to the IRS or State and once I filed I can not open the program again.

title: Love it. So easy to use
content: Love it. So easy to use. I do all the work anyway getting it all together. Turbo Tax makes it easy to enter and checks it for anything I may have forgotten. I have used it every year for 5 years.

title: like the program but the cost is getting much to ...
content: I have been using Turbotax for years, like the program but the cost is getting much to high, $60.00 plus 19.95 for state filing, next year i will be looking at a different method for doing my taxes.

title: Four Stars

title: Success with TurboTax.

title: NOT Amazon's problem. Intuit screwed up and has admitted ...
content: NOT Amazon's problem. Intuit screwed up and has admitted as such. In previous years, this version contained the most basic business Schedule C and two other business forms. Without warning Intuit removed them. DO NOT PURCHASE this version if you have any business expenses. Again. DO NOT PURCHASE this version. If you do accidentally purchase this version and need a Schedule C, go to Intuit's site, do an upgrade to Home & Business, then follow the procedures to get a $25 rebate for the trouble for being forced to upgrade because of their unannounced change to their product. Schedule C business issue aside, Turbo Tax continues to be, what I believe a superb product. I have used it without issue for years.

title: TurboTax is a good product but has sneaky pricing
content: I worked for Intuit for 6 years, including managing teams in both product development and marketing. TurboTax is a solid product and they're the industry leader for a reason. But everyone should know that they have a large team dedicated to testing pricing and up-sells (hidden charges). This change was made to optimize revenue, plain and simple. That's their prerogative, they're a business after all. Bob Meighan is a great guy but it's job to sell the public on these types of business decisions. There are plenty of other options, some better in my opinion. Checkout Common Form or TaxAct. Both have more fair and transparent pricing. (Disclosure: I'm the CEO of Common Form).

title: Experience this year just as good as always
content: So... I looked earlier at all the negative reviews regarding this product, and decided to try out the H&R Block software this year. That was January 19, and I wasted the next 5 weeks trying to get their software to work (see that review, if interested). I finally gave up this morning and downloaded Turbo Tax. That was at approximately 9:40 a.m. At 11:00 a.m., my taxes were done and filed. I'm not sure what the previous issue was, but it sure didn't impact me. I will never second-guess my previous experience again, and TurboTax has a customer for life.

title: Bought H&R going back to TT
content: well, I bought the H&R Block and am extremely unhappy with it. I found a major glitch in the interview that would affect a lot of people that aren't knowledgeable about taxes. first I had major problems with the install, I assume a bad disk. it wouldn't boot directly from the disk and kept saying try again. I finally had to use MY COMPUTER and after a few try's got it to load. the desktop icon is just a green square which could be a glitch and between everything makes me not trust the validity of the disk. the interview is terrible compared to TT and a major flaw I found that in putting in a social security 1099 it doesn't ask you for the Medicare amounts paid and doesn't pinpoint it at any part of the interview even when you get to medical insurance in the schedule A. I found the interview overall extremely lacking. the forms view truly sucks and they incorporate worksheets into the form making too much clutter and confusion. going back to TT since intuit is making good on their screw up. I've been a TT customer since the mid 90's

title: Works fine--a couple of minor gotchas, but it works fine.
content: It works fine. I had some things happen when I'd leave the program and restart it later "at the same place" that were a little tricky, particularly when I'd finished, but before I'd e-filed, then discovered a change I needed to make. The interface LOOKED like it wanted me to buy the state download a second time. I clicked "Buy" and it skipped right to where I wanted to be. But that minor user interface issue aside, I had the usual reasonable experience with Turbo Tax. By downloading it from Amazon.com, I got a special offer to get 10% bonus on a portion of my refund in Amazon gift cards. So, I chose to get $200 of my refund that way so that the $20 bonus would cover the cost of filing my state refund. My refund is pretty simple--so the Deluxe worked for me. If I had investments and a few other relatively common things, I think I would have had to upgrade to a more expensive version. It is important to review your tax needs BEFORE you select a version of TurboTax this year. Bottom line: It's fine. About the 10th or 11th time I've used TurboTax.

title: Installation problems!
content: I have two computers, one older than the other. The older is my main desktop, the other a laptop. I've used TurboTax for 14-15 years with no installation problems. For some reason this year, TurboTax absolutely refused to load onto the desktop. I tried several times to no avail. I finally called TurboTax support and talked to a live person (would you believe a live person??). However this live person knew absolutely nothing about my installation problem. Finally he said, "I'll transfer you to tech support...." I waited and waited and waited.....no tech support. I hung up and tried the live person routine again. This time another agent seemed more helpful with several suggestions....none worked. He, too, said, "hang on, I'll transfer you to tech support," I could hear him asking around for the tech support number, then some muffled voices, then the phone went dead. He lost me (after more than an hour on the phone!!) I never got the problem resolved. I crossed my fingers and tried to install TurboTax on my laptop and voila, it worked. I love TurboTax, but can't say the same for their support staff.

title: Turbo Tax is the BEST!
content: I've been using Turbo Tax since the late 90's. As always the program performs flawlessly, saves a great deal of time and calculates my tax perfectly. I'll use no other program. I see there was a lot of angry customers due to the changes in the Deluxe version this year. Rightly so, but at least Intuit made amends for that poor decision. If I ever need to upgrade from Deluxe, I'll do so without hesitation. And by the way, one of my returns was questioned by the IRS and they demanded a large portion of my Federal refund be returned. I obliged and immediately contacted Turbo Tax quality control satisfaction team about the discrepancy. I forwarded the Turbo Tax response via email to the IRS and within three weeks the IRS returned my money (in full) with interest! How many tax paying citizens can say that? The IRS made the mistake, not Turbo Tax. Had I done my taxes without Turbo Tax and their stellar support, I would never have known the IRS form was inaccurate. I'm a Turbo Tax customer for life!

title: Why I am a big-time TurboTax fan!
content: I'm a huge fan of TurboTax because it is so thorough, fast, and easy ... all in the comfort of my favorite chair at home! TurboTax guides me through every aspect of filing my taxes by simply asking various easy-to-answer questions, and requesting information from the block numbers on my W2s, 1099s, 1098s, and other sources of income and deductions. If I don't have the specific information "right there", I can just skip it and enter it later. (Now you can't do THAT with one of those "bring everything now" tax preparation companies!) I will never pay $400+ again to have an "expert" calculate my taxes. Try $40, and I know that everything was done _perfectly_ so that nothing was missed. Saves me big-time, and I don't overpay my tax anymore. Like I said: "Huge Fan!" Thanks, TurboTax.

They've done it to me with Quicken, which I resented, and they did it again this year by limiting the Federal tax forms that TurboTax Deluxe supports, which evidently just about everyone resented. And it forced Intuit to quickly backpedal because they looked like greedy jerks. The bottom line is that these are good products, but keep an eye out for unwanted changes.

title: A great tax filing software, handicapped by the greed of the publisher.
content: UPDATE: Thanks to the first comment on my review, I noticed that I had forgotten to mention, in my review, that I did switch away from TurboTax to H&R Block's Tax Software, this year, owing mostly to this 'holding for ransom' policy they adopted. I haven't tested that software yet but I'm not worried. I'll write that review after I've used it. About the price hike: I understand that companies have to do what is good for their bottom line but I can't imagine that selling so many millions of copies of TurboTax does not bring in enough revenue to maintain a quality product. But there is only so much that can be said about this considering price gouging is almost becoming a trend. TurboTax Deluxe has always been priced around $50 and I've been able to buy it, always, between $29-$39, on sale. If Intuit had enclosed a warning in last year's release, about an upcoming price increase, I probably wouldn't even have flinched and paid their price hike, without any problem. But to simply reduce functionality of Schedules C, D, etc, under the guise of "consistency with online products" is low. I don't know their online products, never used them, don't care about them, don't care about inconsistency between online and desktop products. So it felt it to be a nasty surprise when I read that those forms were reduced in functionality pending a ransom of another $30-$40. This dislike is reflected in my star rating of 3/5. I still can't imagine giving this product a rating lower than that because it is remarkable in what it does, year in and year out. Software: I've been using TurboTax since it was not even an Intuit product, back in early 90's and it would be easy for me to say that it is a very solid product. Around 2005, I tried to use a competing product and I found it very crude compared to TurboTax so I went back to TurboTax. Features I found very useful: 1. Flawless importing of prior year's data 2. The interview process 3. Direct access to forms 4. Override warnings and auto calculated fields 5. Ability to switch between forms and interview, seamlessly and without losing anything 6. Importing W-2, 1098 and a couple of other forms is very helpful 7. Auditing feature is very reassuring 8. Electronic filing is big help and makes for fast refund 9. Ability to save archives in PDF

title: TurboTax is still awesome!
content: There has been a lot of stink about what Intuit did with Turbo Tax. When I first started looking in December, I was pretty disappointed and like many others started looking at alternatives. Then I got the first email from Intuit stating I would get a $25 discount. I thought that was ok, but for my situation, didn't really cover it. I wasn't convinced. Then, I got the second email in which they basically apologized for not thinking this through and not realizing the impact it had. They let me know that I would have access to whatever I needed. I've been a TurboTax user for about 15 years. I went ahead again this year and bought the same one as always. Here's what I can tell you: It is as awesome as always! When it hit the first "you need to upgrade" message, it was for $0 dollars and only took 30 seconds to upgrade. Same for the second. So I got everything I needed for my Schedule C and more in the Deluxe version. It's unfortunate that Intuit made this bad decision, but let's be realistic - mistakes happen. I'm impressed that they realized their mistake and fixed it. There are a lot of bad reviews about this - look at the date. If they are before Feb 7, then they aren't current. Look at the responses to those and you will see the real story from Intuit/Turbo Tax.

title: TurboTax - does the work for you - Definitely worth it.
content: We use TurboTax every year, to do our on-line 1040 Tax file, and have found it to be a wonderful way to do our taxes, ourselves. This year, filing for 2014 tax year, when we had acquired all the necessary data forms, our W2's and 1099, etc., , with the program's step-by-step guidance, easily completed the TurboTax process in about an hour, submitted it then, on Saturday, January 31, 2015. That same evening, we received an email notice, that it had been "accepted" by the IRS. Amazingly, we received the expected Refund, via automatic deposit, on Monday, February 9. 2015. Wow! How great is that?! Definitely, TurboTax is the way to go! Not like the old days of manually completing all the paperwork, and mailing it in to the IRS, and waiting months, for the Refund. TurboTax is well worth it! Definitely rate it as 5 star product

content: First time users of TT - though it took us awhile to complete them, in the end we were thankful for that because of the detailed nature of the program. It sweats the small stuff, and helped us get back slightly more than we were expecting. I loved the feature that quotes donation fees based on items donated! It was easy, and we will be returning customers next year. We e-filed our Federal on a Sunday, and two Monday's later we had our direct deposit posted to our bank account. We were/are a little confused about the State filing, we chose to print & file our own...but the paperwork TT printed off had a "watermark" stating "NOT COMPLETE, DO NOT FILE"...and though we completed the prompts requested - it still kept printing it off....I'm curious to see what happens with the state, we haven't heard back yet.
